GK22vispancu:4: brahmā rudraḥ kumāro hari-varuṇa-yamā vahnir indraḥ kuberaś

GK22vispancu:18: tad etān paśyato me mahad api rājyaṃ na saukhyam āvahati |

GK22vispancu:25: kiṃ tayā kriyate dhenvā yā na sūte na dugdhadā |

GK22vispancu:46: tad atrāsti viṣṇuśarmā nāma brāhmaṇaḥ sakala-śāstra-pāraṅgamaś
GK22vispancu:49: sa nūnaṃ drāk prabuddhān kariṣyati iti |

GK22vispancu:54: atha viṣṇu-śarmā taṃ rājānam āha-deva śrūyatāṃ me tathya-vacanam |

GK22vispancu:63: ceti pañca-tantrāṇi racayitvā pāṭhitās te rājaputrāḥ |

GK22vispancu:67: adhīte ya idaṃ nityaṃ nīti-śāstraṃ śṛṇoti ca |

GK22vispancu:77: asti dakṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṃ nāma nagaram |

GK22vispancu:91: arthebhyo 'pi hi vṛddhebhyaḥ saṃvṛttebhya itas tataḥ |

GK22vispancu:95: aśanād indriyāṇīva syuḥ kāryāṇy akhilāny api |

GK22vispancu:99: gata-vayasām api puṃsāṃ yeṣām arthā bhavanti te taruṇāḥ |

GK22vispancu:107: na manye vāṇijyāt kim api paramaṃ vartanam iha ||Panc_1.11||

GK22vispancu:110: tac ca vāṇijyaṃ sapta-vidham arthāgamāya syāt |
GK22vispancu:112: paricita-grāhakāgamaḥ, mithyā-kraya-kathanam, kūṭa-tulā-mānam, deśāntarād bhāṇḍānayanaṃ ceti
GK22vispancu:114: paṇyānāṃ gāndhikaṃ paṇyaṃ kim anyaiḥ kāñcanādibhiḥ |
GK22vispancu:115: yatraikena ca yat krītaṃ tac chatena pradīyate ||Panc_1.13||
GK22vispancu:116: nikṣepe patite harmye śreṣṭhī stauti sva-devatām |

GK22vispancu:124: mithyā-krayasya kathanaṃ prakṛtir iyaṃ syāt kirātānām ||Panc_1.17||
GK22vispancu:127: ity evaṃ sampradhārya mathurā-gāmīni bhāṇḍāny ādāya śubhāyāṃ tithau
GK22vispancu:131: tayor ekaḥ saṃjīvakābhidhāno yamunā-kaccham avatīrṇaḥ sampaṅka-pūram āsādya

GK22vispancu:136: siṃha-vyāghra-samākule bahv-apāye'smin vane samasta-sārthas tvayā sandehe niyojitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:138: na svalpasya kṛte bhūri nāśayen matimān naraḥ |

GK22vispancu:143: asmābhis tu sārthavāhasyābhīṣṭa iti matvā vahninā saṃskṛtaḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:150: bāla-tṛṇāgrāṇi bhakṣayan katipayair ahobhir hara-vṛṣabha iva pīnaḥ kakudmān balavāṃś ca saṃvṛttaḥ |

GK22vispancu:160: caturmaṇḍalāvasthānaṃ tv idaṃ- siṃhaḥ siṃhānuyāyinaḥ kākaravāḥ kivṛttā iti |

GK22vispancu:265: so 'bravīt- katham ahaṃ sevānabhijñaḥ ? mayā hi tātotsaṅge

GK22vispancu:271: sā sevā yā prabhu-hitā grāhyā vākya-viśeṣataḥ |

GK22vispancu:681: nṛpa-kāryaṃ ca kurvatā tuṣṭiṃ nītās tat-pura-vāsino lokā nṛpatiś ca |
GK22vispancu:683: bahunā, na ko 'pi tādṛk kenāpi caturo dṛṣṭo śruto vā |
GK22vispancu:688: iti mahati virodhe vartamāne samāne nṛpati-jana-padānāṃ durlabhaḥ kārya-kartā ||Panc_1.142||
GK22vispancu:689: athaivaṃ gacchati kāle danitlasya kadācid vivāhaḥ sampravṛttaḥ |
GK22vispancu:690: tatra tena sarve pura-nivāsino rāja-saṃnidhi-lokāś ca sammāna-puraḥsaram
GK22vispancu:692: tato vivāhānantaraṃ rājā sāntaḥpuraḥ sva-gṛham ānīyābhyarcitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:697: tataḥ prabhṛti niśvasann apamānān na rātrāv apy adhiśete |
GK22vispancu:698: kathaṃ mayā tasya bhāṇḍapate rāja-prasāda-hāniḥ kartavyā iti cintayann āste |
GK22vispancu:700: na kiṃcin mayā tasyāpakartuṃ śakyam iti
GK22vispancu:702: yo hy apakartum aśaktaḥ kupyati kim asau naro 'tra nirlajjaḥ |
GK22vispancu:705: atha kadācit pratyūṣe yoga-nidrāṃ gatasya rājñaḥ śayyānte mārjanaṃ kurvann idam āha-aho dantilasya mahad dṛptatvaṃ yad rāja-mahiṣīm āliṅgati |
GK22vispancu:706: tac chrutvā rājā sa-sambhramam utthāya tam uvāca-bho bho gorambha |
GK22vispancu:709: gorambhaḥ prāha-deva ! rātri-jāgaraṇena dyūtāsaktasya me balān nidrā samāyātā |
GK22vispancu:713: tat kadācid anena devī samāliṅgyamānā dṛṣṭā bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:716: yad vāñchati divā martyo vīkṣate vā karoti vā |
GK22vispancu:717: tat svapne'pi tad-abhyāsād brūte vātha karoti vā ||Panc_1.144||
GK22vispancu:719: śubhaṃ vā yadi pāpaṃ yan nṝṇāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam |
GK22vispancu:720: sugūḍham api taj jñeyaṃ svapna-vākyāt tathā madāt ||Panc_1.145||
GK22vispancu:722: jalpanti sārdham anyena paśyanty anyaṃ sa-vibhramāḥ |
GK22vispancu:723: hṛd-gataṃ cintayanty anyaṃ priyaḥ ko nāma yoṣitām ||Panc_1.146||
GK22vispancu:725: ekena smita-pāṭalādhara-ruco jalpanty analpākṣaraṃ vīkṣante'nyam itaḥ
GK22vispancu:727: dūrodāra-caritra-citra-vibhavaṃ dhyāyanti cānyaṃ dhiyā kenetthaṃ paramārthato 'rthavad iva premāsti vāma-bhruvām ||Panc_1.147||
GK22vispancu:731: raho nāsti kṣaṇo nāsti nāsti prārthayitā naraḥ |
GK22vispancu:733: yo mohān manyate mūḍho rakteyaṃ mama kāminī |
GK22vispancu:734: sa tasyā vaśago nityaṃ bhavet krīḍā-śakuntavat ||Panc_1.150||
GK22vispancu:735: tāsāṃ vākyāni kṛtyāni svalpāni sugurūṇy api |
GK22vispancu:736: karoti saḥ kṛtair loke laghutvaṃ yāti sarvataḥ ||Panc_1.151||
GK22vispancu:737: striyaṃ ca yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchati |
GK22vispancu:738: īṣac ca kurute sevāṃ tam evecchanti yoṣitaḥ ||Panc_1.152||
GK22vispancu:741: nāsāṃ kaścid agamyo 'sti nāsāṃ ca vayasi sthitiḥ |
GK22vispancu:742: virūpaṃ rūpavantaṃ vā pumān ity eva bhujyate ||Panc_1.154||
GK22vispancu:743: rakto hi jāyate bhogyo nārīṇāṃ śāṭikā yathā |
GK22vispancu:745: alaktiko yathā rakto niṣpīḍya puruṣas tathā |
GK22vispancu:747: evaṃ sa rājā bahuvidhaṃ vilapya tat-prabhṛti dantilasya
GK22vispancu:750: dantilo 'py akasmād eva prasāda-parāṅmukham avanipatim avalokya cintayāmāsa-aho sādhu cedam
GK22vispancu:751: ko 'rthān prāpya na garvito viṣayiṇaḥ kasyāpado 'staṃ gatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāmā rājñāṃ priyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:752: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntara-gataḥ ko 'rthī gato gauravaṃ ko vā durjana-vāgurāsu patitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān ||Panc_1.157||
GK22vispancu:754: kāke śaucaṃ dyūta-kāreṣu satyaṃ sarpe kṣāntiḥ strīṣu kāmopaśāntiḥ |
GK22vispancu:755: klībe dhairyaṃ madyape tattva-cintā rājā mitraṃ kena dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā
GK22vispancu:756: aparaṃ mayāsya bhūpater athavānyasyāpi kasyacid rāja-sambandhinaḥ
GK22vispancu:758: tat kim etat-parāṅmukho māṃ prati bhūpatiḥ iti
GK22vispancu:759: evaṃ taṃ dantilaṃ kadācid rāja-dvāre viṣkambhitaṃ vilokya saṃmārjana-kartā
GK22vispancu:760: gorambho vihasya dvārapālān idam ūce-bho bho dvārapālāḥ !
GK22vispancu:762: tad anena nivāritena yathāhaṃ tathā yūyam apy ardha-candra-bhājino bhaviṣyatha
GK22vispancu:763: | tac chrutvā dantilaś cintayāmāsa-nūnam idam asya gorambhasya ceṣṭitam |
GK22vispancu:767: api kāpuruṣo bhīruḥ syāc cen nṛpati-sevakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:768: tathāpi na parābhūtiṃ janād āpnoti mānavaḥ ||Panc_1.160||
GK22vispancu:769: evaṃ sa bahu-vidhaṃ vilapya vilakṣa-manāḥ sodvego gata-prabhāvaḥ sva-gṛhaṃ
GK22vispancu:770: niśāmukhe gorambham āhūya vastra-yugalena saṃmānyedam uvāca-bhadra ! mayā na tadā tvaṃ rāga-vaśān niḥsāritaḥ |
GK22vispancu:774: so 'pi svarga-rājyopamaṃ tad-vastra-yugalam āsādya paraṃ paritoṣaṃ gatvā tam uvāca-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin ! kṣāntaṃ mayā te tat |
GK22vispancu:775: tad asya saṃmānasya kṛte paśya me buddhi-prabhāvaṃ rāja-prasādaṃ ca |
GK22vispancu:779: aho sasadṛśo ceṣṭā tulāyaṣṭeḥ khalasya ca ||Panc_1.161||
GK22vispancu:780: tataś cānye-dyuḥ sa gorambho rāja-kule gatvā yoga-nidrāṃ gatasya bhūpateḥ saṃmārjana-kriyāṃ kurvann idam āha-aho aviveko 'smad-bhūpateḥ |
GK22vispancu:782: tac chrutvā rājā sa-vismayaṃ tam uvāca-re re gorambha ! kim aprastutaṃ lapasi |
GK22vispancu:784: kiṃ tvayā kadācid aham evaṃvidhaṃ karma samācaran dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:789: | tat prasādaṃ karotu svāmī nidrā-paravaśasya iti |
GK22vispancu:790: evaṃ śrutvā rājā cintitavān-yan mayā janmāntare purīṣotsargaṃ kurvatā kadāpi cirbhaṭikā na bhakṣitā |
GK22vispancu:791: tad yathāyaṃ vyatikaro 'sambhāvyo mamānena mūḍhena vyāhṛtaḥ |
GK22vispancu:793: tan mayā na yuktaṃ kṛtaṃ yat sa varākaḥ saṃmānena viyojitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:795: tad-abhāvena rāja-kṛtyāni paura-kṛtyāni na sarvāṇi śithilatāṃ vrajanti |
GK22vispancu:796: evam anekadhā vimṛśya dantilaṃ samāhūya nijāṅga-vastrābharaṇādibhiḥ
GK22vispancu:798: ato 'haṃ bravīmi yo na pūjayate garvāt iti |
GK22vispancu:800: yad bhavatābhihitaṃ tad eva mayā kartavyam iti |
GK22vispancu:801: evam abhihite damanakas tam ādāya piṅgalaka-sakāśam agamat
GK22vispancu:802: | āha ca-deva eṣa mayānītaḥ sa saṃjīvakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:804: saṃjīvako 'pi taṃ sādaraṃ praṇamyāgrataḥ sa-vinayaṃ sthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:806: 'pi tasya pīnāyata-kakudmato nakha-kuliśālaṃkṛtaṃ dakṣiṇa-pāṇim upari dattvā māna-puraḥsaram uvāca-api śivaṃ bhavataḥ |
GK22vispancu:807: kutas tvam asmin vane vijane samāyāto 'si ?
GK22vispancu:809: yathā vardhamānena saha viyogaḥ saṃjātas tathā sarvaṃ niveditam |
GK22vispancu:810: tac chrutvā piṅgalakaḥ sādarataraṃ tam uvāca-vayasya na bhetavyam |
GK22vispancu:813: yataḥ kāraṇād bahv-apāyaṃ raudra-sattva-niṣevitaṃ vanaṃ gurūṇām api
GK22vispancu:816: evam uktvā sakala-mṛga-parivṛto yamunā-kaccham avatīryodaka-grahaṇaṃ kṛtvā svecchayā tad eva vanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:817: tataś ca karakaṭa-damanaka-nikṣipta-rājya-bhāraḥ saṃjīvikena saha subhāṣita-goṣṭhīm
GK22vispancu:822: saṃjīvakenāpy aneka-śāstrāvagāhanād utpanna-buddhi-prāgalbhyena stokair evāhobhir mūḍha-matiḥ piṅgalako dhīmāṃs tathā kṛto yathāraṇya-dharmād
GK22vispancu:829: | anyac ca siṃha-parākramābhāvāt sarvo 'pi mṛga-janas tau ca śṛgālau
GK22vispancu:832: phala-hīnaṃ nṛpaṃ bhṛtyāḥ kulīnam api connatam |
GK22vispancu:833: santy ajyāny atra gacchanti śuṣkaṃ vṛkṣam ivāṇḍajāḥ ||Panc_1.163||
GK22vispancu:836: vṛtti-bhaṅgān mahīpālaṃ tyajanty eva hi sevakāḥ ||Panc_1.164||
GK22vispancu:839: kadācit taṃ na muñcanti bhartsitā api sevakāḥ ||Panc_1.165||
GK22vispancu:840: tathā ca kevalaṃ sevakā itthambhūtā yāvat samastam apy etaj jagat parasparaṃ bhakṣaṇārthaṃ sāmādibhir upāyais tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:843: vaṇijo grāhakāṇāṃ ca mūrkhāṇām api paṇḍitāḥ ||Panc_1.166||
GK22vispancu:847: upajīvanti śaktyā hi jalajā jaladān iva ||Panc_1.168||
GK22vispancu:850: abhiprāyā na sidhyanti tenedaṃ vartate jagat ||Panc_1.169||
GK22vispancu:851: attuṃ vāñchati śāmbhavo gaṇapater ākhuṃ kṣudhārtaḥ phaṇī taṃ ca krauñca-ripoḥ śikhī giri-sutā-siṃho 'pi nāgāśanam |
GK22vispancu:852: itthaṃ yatra parigrahasya ghaṭanā śambhor api syād gṛhe tatrāpy asya kathaṃ na bhāvi jagato yasmāt svarūpaṃ hi tat ||Panc_1.170||
GK22vispancu:861: karaṭaka āha-yadyapi tvadīya-vacanaṃ na karoti tathāpi svāmī
GK22vispancu:869: tat tvayaiṣa śaṣpa-bhojī svāminaḥ sakāśam ānītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:876: dūtikā para-kāryeṇa trayo doṣāḥ svayaṃ kṛtāḥ ||Panc_1.173||
GK22vispancu:882: tatra deva-śarmā nāma parivrājakaḥ partivasati sma |
GK22vispancu:885: naktaṃ dinaṃ kakṣāntarāt tāṃ mātrāṃ na muñcati |
GK22vispancu:887: arthānām arjane duḥkham arjitānāṃ ca rakṣaṇe |
GK22vispancu:888: nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ dhig arthāḥ kaṣṭa-saṃśrayāḥ ||Panc_1.174||
GK22vispancu:889: athāṣāḍha-bhūtir nāma para-vittāpahārī dhūrtas tām artha-mātrāṃ tasya
GK22vispancu:892: tad atra maṭhe tāvad dṛḍha-śilā-sañcaya-vaśād bhitti-bhedo na bhavati |
GK22vispancu:893: uccaistaratvāc ca dvāre praveśo na syāt |
GK22vispancu:895: viśvāsyāhaṃ chātratāṃ vrajāmi yena sa viśvastaḥ kadācid viśvāsam eti |
GK22vispancu:898: nāvidagdhaḥ priyaṃ brūyāt sphuṭa-vaktā na vañcakaḥ ||Panc_1.175||
GK22vispancu:899: evaṃ niścitya tasyāntikam upagamya-oṃ namaḥ śivāya-iti proccārya sāṣṭāṅgaṃ praṇamya ca sa-praśrayam uvāca-bhagavan asāraḥ saṃsāro 'yam |
GK22vispancu:905: | tat kiṃ kurvato me saṃsāra-samudrottaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:906: tac chrutvā deva-śarmā sādaram āha-vatsa ! dhanyo 'si yat prathame vayasy
GK22vispancu:909: pūrvaṃ vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ |
GK22vispancu:910: dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate ||Panc_1.176||
GK22vispancu:911: ādau citte tataḥ kāye satāṃ saṃjāyate jarā |
GK22vispancu:912: asatāṃ ca punaḥ kāye naiva citte kadācana ||Panc_1.177||
GK22vispancu:915: śūdro vā yadi vānyo 'pi caṇḍālo 'pi jaṭādharaḥ |
GK22vispancu:916: dīkṣitaḥ śiva-mantreṇa sa bhasmāṅgī śivo bhavet ||Panc_1.178||
GK22vispancu:917: ṣaḍ-akṣareṇa mantreṇa puṣpam ekam api svayam |
GK22vispancu:918: liṅgasya mūrdhni yo dadyān na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate ||Panc_1.179||
GK22vispancu:919: tac chrutvāṣāḍha-bhūtis tat-pādau gṛhītvā sa-praśrayam idam āha-bhagavan,
GK22vispancu:927: durmantrān nṛpatir vinaśyati yatiḥ saṅgāt suto lālasād vipro 'nadhyayanāt kulaṃ kutanayāc chīlaṃ khalopāsanāt |
GK22vispancu:928: maitrī cāpraṇayāt samṛddhir anayāt snehaḥ pravāsāśrayāt strī garvād anavekṣaṇād api kṛṣis tyāgāt pramādād dhanam ||Panc_1.180||
GK22vispancu:929: tat tvayā vrata-grahaṇānantaraṃ maṭha-dvāre tṛṇa-kuṭīrake śayitavyam iti |
GK22vispancu:935: punas tathāpi muniḥ kakṣāntarān mātrāṃ na muñcati |
GK22vispancu:936: athaivaṃ gacchati kāle āṣāḍha-bhūtiś cintayāmāsa-aho, na kathañcid eṣa me viśvāsam āgacchati
GK22vispancu:937: tat kiṃ divāpi śastreṇa mārayāmi, kiṃ vā viṣaṃ prayacchāmi ?
GK22vispancu:939: evaṃ cintayatas tasya devaśarmaṇo 'pi śiṣya-putraḥ kaścid grāmād āmantraṇārthaṃ samāyātaḥ
GK22vispancu:940: prāha ca-bhagavan, pavitrāropaṇa-kṛte mama gṛham āgamyatām iti |
GK22vispancu:941: tac chrutvā devaśarmāṣāḍhabhūtinā saha prahṛṣṭa-manāḥ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:942: athaivaṃ tasya gacchato 'gre kācin nadī samāyātā |
GK22vispancu:943: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mātrāṃ kakṣāntarād avatārya kanthā-madhye suguptāṃ nidhāya snātvā devārcanaṃ vidhāya tad-anantaram āṣāḍhabhūtim idam āha-bho āṣāḍhabhūte ! yāvad ahaṃ purīṣotsargaṃ kṛtvā samāgacchāmi, tāvad eṣā kanthā yogeśvarasya svāvadhānatayā rakṣaṇīyā |
GK22vispancu:945: āṣāḍhabhūtir api tasminn adarśanī-bhūte mātrām ādāya satvaraṃ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:946: devaśarmāpi chātra-guṇānurañjita-manāḥ suviśvasto yāvad upaviṣṭas tiṣṭhati tāvat suvarṇa-roma-deha-yūtha-madhye huḍu-yuddham apaśyat |
GK22vispancu:948: roṣa-vaśād dhuḍu-yugalasya dūram apasaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhūyo 'pi samupetya
GK22vispancu:954: yadi katham apy anayoḥ saṅghaṭṭe patiṣyati tan nūnaṃ mṛtyum avāpsyatīti vitarkayāmi |
GK22vispancu:955: kṣaṇāntare ca tathaiva raktāsvādana-laulyān madhye praviśaṃs tayoḥ
GK22vispancu:957: devaśarmāpi taṃ śocamāno mātrām uddiśya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prasthito yāvad āṣāḍhabhūtiṃ na paśyati tataś cautsukyena śaucaṃ vidhāya yāvat kanthām ālokayati tāvan mātrāṃ na paśyati |
GK22vispancu:958: tataś ca-hā hā muṣito 'smi iti jalpan pṛthivī-tale mūrcchayā nipapāta |
GK22vispancu:959: tataḥ kṣaṇāc cetanāṃ labdhvā bhūyo 'pi samutthāya phūtkartum ārabdhaḥ-bho
GK22vispancu:960: āṣāḍhabhūte ! kva māṃ vañcayitvā gato 'si ? tad dehi me prativacanam |
GK22vispancu:961: evaṃ bahu vilapya tasya pada-paddhatim anveṣayan śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prasthitaḥ
GK22vispancu:962: | athaiva gacchan sāyantana-samaye kañcid grāmam āsasāda |
GK22vispancu:963: atha tasmād grāmāt kaścit kaulikaḥ sabhārhyo madya-pāna-kṛte samīpa-vartini nagare prasthitaḥ
GK22vispancu:964: devaśarmāpi tam ālokya provāca-bho bhadra vayaṃ sūryoḍhā
GK22vispancu:966: na kam apy atra grāme jānīmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:972: tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk-caturthī ca sūnṛtā |
GK22vispancu:976: kauliko 'pi tac chrutvā bhāryām āha-priye, gaccha tv atithim ādāya gṛhaṃ prati pāda-śauca-bhojana-śayanādibhiḥ satkṛtya tvaṃ tatraiva tiṣṭha |
GK22vispancu:979: sāpi bhāryā puṃścalī tam ādāya prahasita-vadanā devadattaṃ manasi dhyāyantī gṛhaṃ prati pratasthe
GK22vispancu:984: paryaṅkeṣv āstaraṇaṃ patim anukūlaṃ manoharaṃ śayanam |
GK22vispancu:985: tṛṇam iva laghu manyante kāminyaś caurya-rata-lubdhāḥ ||Panc_1.185||
GK22vispancu:987: keliṃ pradahati lajjā śṛṅgāro 'sthīni cāṭavaḥ kaṭavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:988: vandha-trayāḥ paritoṣo na kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ bhavet patyau ||Panc_1.186||
GK22vispancu:991: atha kaulika-bhāryā gṛhaṃ gatvā deva-śarmaṇe gatāstaraṇaṃ bhagnāṃ ca
GK22vispancu:992: khaṭvāṃ samarpyedam āha-bho bhagavan ! yāvad ahaṃ sva-sakhīṃ grāmād abhyāgatāṃ sambhāvya drutam āgacchāmi tāvat tvayā mad-gṛhe'pramattena
GK22vispancu:994: evam abhidhāya śṛṅgāra-vidhiṃ vidhāya yāvad-devadattam uddiśya vrajati tāvat tad-bhartā saṃmukho mada-vihvalāṅgo mukta-keśaḥ pade pade praskhalan
GK22vispancu:996: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sā drutataraṃ vyāghuṭya
GK22vispancu:999: tāṃ palāyamānāṃ kṛtādbhuta-śṛṅgārāṃ vilokya prāg eva karṇa-paramparayā
GK22vispancu:1001: tataś ca tathāvidhaṃ ceṣṭitam avalokya dṛṣṭa-pratyayaḥ krodha-vaśago gṛhaṃ praviśya tām uvāca-āḥ pāpe puṃścali ! kva prasthitāsi ?
GK22vispancu:1002: sā provāca-ahaṃ tvat-sakāśād āgatā na kutracid api nirgatā |
GK22vispancu:1003: tat kathaṃ madya-pāna-vaśād aprastutaṃ vadasi ? athavā sādhv idam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:1008: so 'pi tac chrutvā pratikūla-vacanaṃ veśa-viparyayaṃ cāvalokya tam āha-puṃścali ! cira-kālaṃ śruto mayā tavāpavādaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1011: ity abhidhāya laguḍa-prahārais tāṃ jarjarita-dehāṃ vidhāya sthūṇayā saha
GK22vispancu:1012: dṛḍha-bandhanena baddhvā so 'pi mada-vihvalo vijñāya tāṃ gatvedam
GK22vispancu:1013: āha-sakhi ! sa devadattas tasmin sthāne tvāṃ pratīkṣate |
GK22vispancu:1016: tat kathaṃ gacchāmi ? tad gatvā brūhi taṃ kāminaṃ yad asyāṃ rātrau na tvayā saha samāgamaḥ
GK22vispancu:1021: uṣṭrāṇām iva teṣāṃ manye'haṃ śaṃsitaṃ janma ||Panc_1.190||
GK22vispancu:1023: sandigdhe para-loke janāpavāde ca jagati bahu-citre |
GK22vispancu:1026: yadi bhavati deva-yogāt pumān virūpo 'pi bandhako rahasi |
GK22vispancu:1027: na tu kṛcchrād api bhadraṃ nija-kāntaṃ sā bhajaty eva ||Panc_1.192||
GK22vispancu:1028: sābravīt-yady evaṃ tarhi kathaya kathaṃ dṛḍha-bandhana-baddhā satī tatra gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:1030: nāpity āha-sakhi, mada-vihvalo 'yaṃ sūrya-kara-spṛṣṭaḥ prabodhaṃ yāsyati |
GK22vispancu:1035: tad anu sā nāpitī tāṃ sva-sakhīṃ bandhanād vimocya tasyāḥ sthāne
GK22vispancu:1036: yathā-pūrvam ātmānaṃ baddhvā tāṃ devadatta-sakāśe saṅketa-sthānaṃ
GK22vispancu:1038: tathānuṣṭhite kaulikaḥ kasmiṃścit kṣaṇe samutthāya kiṃcid
GK22vispancu:1039: gata-kopo vimadas tām āha-he paruṣa-vādini ! yad adya-prabhṛti gṛhān niṣkramaṇaṃ na karoṣi, na ca paruṣaṃ vadasi, tatas tvām unmocayāmi |
GK22vispancu:1040: nāpity api svara-bheda-bhayād yāvan na kiṃcid ūce, tāvat so 'pi bhūyo bhūyas tāṃ tad evāha
GK22vispancu:1041: atha sā yāvat pratyuttaraṃ kim api na dadau, tāvat sa prakupitas tīkṣṇa-śastram ādāya nāsikām acchinat |
GK22vispancu:1047: devaśarmāpi vitta-nāśāt kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭho naṣṭa-nidras tat sarvaṃ strī-caritram apaśyat
GK22vispancu:1049: surata-sukham anubhūya kasmiṃścit kṣaṇe sva-gṛham āgataya tāṃ nāpitīm idam
GK22vispancu:1052: nāpity āha-śivaṃ nāsikayā vinā śeṣasya śarīrasya |
GK22vispancu:1053: tad drutaṃ tāṃ mocaya bandhanād yāvan nāyaṃ māṃ paśyati, yena sva-gṛhaṃ gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:1054: tathānuṣṭhite bhūyo 'pi kaulika utthāya tām āha-puṃścali ! kim adyāpi na
GK22vispancu:1055: vadasi ? kiṃ bhūyo 'py ato duṣṭataraṃ nigrahaṃ karṇa-cchedena karomi ?
GK22vispancu:1056: atha sā sa-kopaṃ sādhikṣepam idam āha-dhiṅ mahā-mūḍha ! ko māṃ mahā-satīṃ
GK22vispancu:1057: dharṣayituṃ vyaṅgayituṃ vā samarthaḥ ? tac chṛṇvantu sarve'pi loka-pālāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1060: tānīndriyāṇi balavanti sudurjayāni ye nirjayanti bhuvane balinas ta eke ||Panc_1.193||
GK22vispancu:1061: tad yadi mama satītvam asti, manasāpi para-puruṣo nābhilaṣitaḥ, tato devā bhūyo 'pi me nāsikāṃ tādṛg-rūpākṣatāṃ kurvantu |
GK22vispancu:1063: para-puruṣasya bhrāntir api bhavati, māṃ bhasmasān nayantu |
GK22vispancu:1064: evam uktvā bhūyo 'pi tam āha-bho durātman ! paśya me satītva-prabhāveṇa tādṛśy eva nāsikā saṃvṛttā |
GK22vispancu:1065: athāsāv ulmukam ādāya yāvat paśyati, tāvat tad-rūpāṃ nāsikāṃ ca bhūtale
GK22vispancu:1067: atha sa vismita-manās tāṃ bandhanād vimucya śayyāyām āropya ca cāṭu-śataiḥ paryatoṣayat
GK22vispancu:1068: devaśarmāpi taṃ sarva-vṛttāntam ālokya vismita-manā idam āha-
GK22vispancu:1069: śambarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucer api |
GK22vispancu:1070: baleḥ kumbhīnasaś caiva sarvās tā yoṣito viduḥ ||Panc_1.194||
GK22vispancu:1071: hasantaṃ prahasanty etā rudantaṃ prarudanty api |
GK22vispancu:1073: uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ yac ca veda bṛhaspatiḥ |
GK22vispancu:1074: strī-buddhyā na viśiṣyete tāḥ sma rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ naraiḥ ||Panc_1.196||
GK22vispancu:1075: anṛtaṃ satyam ity āhuḥ satyaṃ cāpi tathānṛtam |
GK22vispancu:1076: iti yās tāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣair iha ||Panc_1.197||
GK22vispancu:1078: nātiprasaṅgaḥ pramadāsu kāryo necched balaṃ strīṣu vivardhamānam |
GK22vispancu:1079: atiprasaktaiḥ puruṣair yatas tāḥ krīḍanti kākair iva lūna-pakṣaiḥ ||Panc_1.198||
GK22vispancu:1080: sumukhena vadanti vagunā praharanty eva śitena cetasā |
GK22vispancu:1081: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālāhalaṃ mahad-viṣam ||Panc_1.199||
GK22vispancu:1082: ata eva nipīyate'dharo hṛdayaṃ muṣṭibhir eva tāḍyate |
GK22vispancu:1085: āvartaḥ saṃśayānām avinaya-bhavanaṃ pattanaṃ sāhasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ saṃnidhānaṃ
GK22vispancu:1088: strī-yantraṃ kena sṛṣṭaṃ viṣam amṛta-mayaṃ prāṇi-lokasya pāśaḥ
GK22vispancu:1089: kārkaśyaṃ stanayor dṛśos taralatālīkaṃ mukhe ślāghyate kauṭilyaṃ
GK22vispancu:1090: kaca-saṃcaye ca vacane māndyaṃ trike sthūlatā |
GK22vispancu:1091: bhīrutvaṃ hṛdaye sadaiva kathitaṃ māyā-prayogaḥ priye yāsāṃ doṣa-gaṇo guṇo
GK22vispancu:1093: etā hasanti ca rudanti ca kārya-hetor
GK22vispancu:1094: viśvāsayanti ca paraṃ na ca viśvasanti |
GK22vispancu:1095: tasmān nareṇa kula-śīla-samanvitena nāryaḥ śmaśāna-ghaṭikā iva varjanīyāḥ ||Panc_1.203||
GK22vispancu:1096: tasmān nareṇa kulaśīlavatā sadaiva nāryaḥ śmaśāna-vaṭikā iva varjanīyāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1098: kurvanti tāvat prathamaṃ priyāṇi yāvan na jānanti naraṃ prasaktam |
GK22vispancu:1103: striyaḥ kṛtārthāḥ puruṣaṃ nirarthaṃ niṣpīḍotālaktakavat tyajanti ||Panc_1.206||
GK22vispancu:1105: aśaucaṃ nirdayatvaṃ ca strīṇāṃ doṣāḥ svabhāvajāḥ ||Panc_1.207||
GK22vispancu:1107: etāḥ praviśya saralaṃ hṛdayaṃ narāṇāṃ kiṃ vā na vāma-nayanā na samācaranti ||Panc_1.208||
GK22vispancu:1108: antar-viṣa-mayā hy etā bahiś caiva manoramāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1110: evaṃ cintayatas tasya parivrājakasya sā niśā mahatā kṛcchreṇāticakrāma |
GK22vispancu:1111: sā ca dūtikā chinna-nāsikā sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā cintayāmāsa-kim idānīṃ kartavyam ? katham etan mahac-chidraṃ sthagayitavyam ?
GK22vispancu:1112: atha tasyā evaṃ vicintayantyā bhartā kārya-vaśād rāja-kule paryuṣitaḥ pratyūṣe ca sva-gṛham abhyupetya dvāra-deśa-stho
GK22vispancu:1113: vividha-paura-kṛtyotsukatayā tām āha-bhadre śīghram ānīyatāṃ kṣura-bhāṇḍaṃ
GK22vispancu:1117: nāpito 'py utsukatayā tam ekaṃ kṣuram avalokya kopāviṣṭaḥ san tad-abhimukham eva taṃ kṣuraṃ
GK22vispancu:1119: etasminn antare sā duṣṭordhva-bāhū vidhāya phutakartu-manā
GK22vispancu:1124: atrāntare rāja-puruṣāḥ samabhyetya taṃ nāpitaṃ laguḍa-prahārair
GK22vispancu:1125: jarjarīkṛtya dṛḍha-bandhanair baddhvā tayā chinnanāsikayā saha
GK22vispancu:1126: dharmādhikaraṇa-sthānaṃ nītvā sabhyān ūcuḥ-śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sabhāsadaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1127: anena nāpitenāparādhaṃ vinā strī-ratnam etad vyaṅgitam |
GK22vispancu:1128: tad asya yad yujyate tat kriyatām |
GK22vispancu:1129: ity abhihite sabhyā ūcuḥ-re nāpita ! kim-arthaṃ tvayā bhāryā vyaṅgitā |
GK22vispancu:1131: unta svit prāṇa-drohaḥ kṛtaḥ, kiṃ vā caurya-karmācaritam |
GK22vispancu:1134: atha taṃ tūṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar ūcuḥ-aho, satyam etad rāja-puruṣāṇāṃ vacaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1139: bhavati hi pāpaṃ kṛtvā sva-karma-santrāsitaḥ puruṣaḥ ||Panc_1.210||
GK22vispancu:1143: adho-dṛṣṭir vadet kṛtvā pāpaṃ prāptaḥ sabhāṃ naraḥ |
GK22vispancu:1144: tasmād yatnāt parijñeyāś cihnair etair vicakṣaṇaiḥ ||Panc_1.212||
GK22vispancu:1147: sabhāyāṃ vakti sāmarṣaṃ sāvaṣṭambho naraḥ śuciḥ ||Panc_1.213||
GK22vispancu:1151: atha vadhya-sthāne nīyamānaṃ tam avalokya deva-śarmā tān dharmādhikṛtān gatvā provāca-bho bhoḥ, anyānyenaiṣa varāko vadhyate nāpitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1153: tac chrūyatāṃ me vākyam-jambūko huḍu-yuddhena iti |
GK22vispancu:1154: atha te sabhyā ūcuḥ-bho bhagavan ! katham etat ?
GK22vispancu:1155: tato devaśarmā teṣāṃ trayāṇām api vṛttāntaṃ vistareṇākathayat |
GK22vispancu:1156: tad ākarṇya suvismita-manasas te nāpitaṃ vimocya mithaḥ procuḥ-aho !
GK22vispancu:1157: avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo striyo bālāś ca jñātayaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1158: yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ ||Panc_1.214||
GK22vispancu:1159: tad asyā nāsikā-cchedaḥ sva-karmaṇā hi saṃvṛttaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1162: tathānuṣṭhite devaśarmāpi vitta-nāśa-samudbhūta-śoka-rahitaḥ punar api svakīyaṃ maṭhāyatanaṃ jagāma |
GK22vispancu:1164: karaṭaka āha-evaṃ-vidhe vyatikare kiṃ kartavyam āvayoḥ ?
GK22vispancu:1168: ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣuḥ kṣipto dhanuṣmatā |
GK22vispancu:1169: prājñena tu matiḥ kṣiptā hanyād garbha-gatān api ||Panc_1.215||
GK22vispancu:1170: tad ahaṃ māyā-prapañcena guptam āśritya taṃ sphoṭayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1171: karaṭaka āha-bhadra, yadi katham api tava māyā-praveśaṃ piṅgalako
GK22vispancu:1172: jñāsyati, sañjīvako vā tadā nūnaṃ vighāta eva |
GK22vispancu:1174: gūḍha-buddhibhir āpat-kāle vidhure'pi daive buddhiḥ prayoktavyā |
GK22vispancu:1179: tyājyaṃ na dhairyaṃ vidhure'pi daive dhairyāt kadācit sthitm āpnuyāt saḥ |
GK22vispancu:1183: udyoginaṃ satatam atra sameti lakṣmīr daivaṃ hi daivam iti kāpuruṣā vadanti |
GK22vispancu:1184: daivaṃ nihatya kuru pauruṣam ātma-śaktyā yatne kṛte yadi na sidhyati ko
GK22vispancu:1186: tad evaṃ jñātvā sugūḍha-buddhi-prabhāveṇa yathā tau dvāv api na jñāsyataḥ,
GK22vispancu:1189: suprayuktasya dambhasya brahmāpy antaṃ na gacchati |
GK22vispancu:1195: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kaulika-rathakārau mitre prativasataḥ sma |
GK22vispancu:1196: tatra ca bālyāt-prabhṛti sahacāriṇau parasparam atīva sneha-parau
GK22vispancu:1198: atha kadācit tatrādhiṣṭhāne kasmiṃścid devāyatane yātrā-mahotsavaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1199: tatra ca naṭa-nartaka-cāraṇa-saṅkule nānā-deśāgata-janāvṛte tau sahacarau bhramantau kāñcid rāja-kanyāṃ kareṇukārūḍhāṃ sarva-lakṣaṇa-sanāthāṃ
GK22vispancu:1201: athāsau kaulikas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣārdita iva duṣṭa-graha-gṛhīta iiva
GK22vispancu:1204: avalokya rathakāras tad-duḥkha-duḥkhita āpta-puruṣais taṃ samutkṣipya sva-gṛham ānāyayat
GK22vispancu:1205: tatra ca vividhaiḥ śītopacāraiś cikitsakopadiṣṭair mantra-vādibhir upacaryamāṇaiś cirāt kathaṃcit sa-cetano babhūva |
GK22vispancu:1206: tato rathakāreṇa pṛṣṭaḥ-bho mitra ! kim evaṃ tvam akasmād vicetanaḥ sañjātaḥ ? tat kathyatām ātma-svarūpam ?
GK22vispancu:1207: sa āha-vayasya ! yady evaṃ tac chṛṇu me rahasyaṃ yena sarvām ātma-vedanāṃ
GK22vispancu:1209: yadi tvaṃ māṃ suhṛdaṃ manyase tataḥ kāṣṭha-pradānena prasādaḥ kriyatām |
GK22vispancu:1210: kṣamyatāṃ yad vā kiñcit praṇay>atirekād ayuktaṃ tava mayānuṣṭhitam |
GK22vispancu:1211: so 'pi tad ākarṇya bāṣpa-pihita-nayanaḥ sa-gadgadam uvāca-vayasya, yat kiñcid duḥkha-kāraṇaṃ tad vada yena pratīkāraḥ kriyate, yadi śakyate kartum |
GK22vispancu:1214: asādhyaṃ nāsti loke'tra yad brahmāṇḍasya madhyagam ||Panc_1.219||
GK22vispancu:1215: tad eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ yadi sādhyaṃ bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ sādhayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1216: kaulika āha-vayasya, eteṣām anyeṣām api sahasrāṇām upāyānām asādhyaṃ tan me duḥkham |
GK22vispancu:1217: tasmān mama maraṇe mā kāla-kṣepaṃ kuru |
GK22vispancu:1218: rathakāra āha-bho mitra ! yadyapy asādhyaṃ tathāpi nivedaya yenāham api
GK22vispancu:1219: tad asādhyaṃ matvā tvayā samaṃ vahnau praviśāmi |
GK22vispancu:1223: kaulika āha-vayasya, yāsau rāja-kanyā kareṇum ārūḍhā tatrotsave dṛṣṭā,
GK22vispancu:1224: tasyā darśanānantaraṃ makara-dhvajena mameyam avasthā vihitā |
GK22vispancu:1232: nīcā nābhiḥ prakṛtyā kuṭilakam alakaṃ svalpakaṃ cāpi madhyam |
GK22vispancu:1233: kurvatv etāni nāma prasabham iha manaś cintitāny āśu khedaṃ yan māṃ tasyāḥ kapolau dahata iti muhuḥ svacchakau tan na yuktam ||Panc_1.221||
GK22vispancu:1234: rathakāro 'py evaṃ sa-kāmaṃ tad-vacanam ākarṇya sa-smitam idam āha-vayasya
GK22vispancu:1235: ! yady evaṃ tarhi diṣṭyā siddhaṃ naḥ prayojanam |
GK22vispancu:1236: tad adyaiva tayā saha samāgamaḥ kriyatām iti |
GK22vispancu:1237: kaulika āha-vayasya, yatra kanyāntaḥpure vāyuṃ muktvā nānyasya praveśo
GK22vispancu:1238: 'sti tatra rakṣā-puruṣādhiṣṭhite kathaṃ mama tasyā saha samāgamaḥ ? tat kiṃ mām asatya-vacanena viḍambayasi ?
GK22vispancu:1240: evam abhidhāya tat-kṣaṇāt kīla-sañcāriṇaṃ vainateyaṃ bāhu-yugalaṃ
GK22vispancu:1243: tatas tasmin kaulikaṃ samāropya viṣṇu-cihnitaṃ kṛtvā
GK22vispancu:1244: kīla-sañcaraṇa-vijñānaṃ ca darśayitvā provāca-vayasya, anena viṣṇu-rūpeṇa
GK22vispancu:1245: gatvā kanyāntaḥpure niśīthe tāṃ rājakanyām ekākinīṃ
GK22vispancu:1246: sapta-bhūmika-prāsāda-prānta-gatāṃ mugdha-svabhāvāṃ tvāṃ vāsudevaṃ manyamānāṃ svakīya-mithyā-vakroktibhī rañjayitvā vātsyāyanokta-vidhinā
GK22vispancu:1248: kauliko 'pi tad ākarṇya tathā-rūpas tatra gatvā tām āha-rāja-putri, suptā kiṃ vā jāgarṣi ? ahaṃ tava kṛte samudrāt sānurāgo lakṣmīṃ vihāyaivāgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:1249: tat kriyatāṃ mayā saha samāgamaḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:1250: sāpi garuḍārūḍhaṃ caturbhujaṃ sāyudhaṃ kaustubhopetam avalokya sa-vismayā
GK22vispancu:1251: śayanād utthāya provāca-bhagavan ! ahaṃ mānuṣī kīṭikāśuciḥ |
GK22vispancu:1256: paraṃ kiṃ tu rādhā nāma me bhāryā gopa-kula-prasūtā prathama āsīt |
GK22vispancu:1259: ity uktā sā prāha-bhagavan, yady evaṃ tan me tātaṃ prārthaya |
GK22vispancu:1262: kaulika āha-subhage, nāhaṃ darśana-pathaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:1265: no cec chāpaṃ dattvā sānvayaṃ te pitaraṃ bhasmasāt kariṣyāmi iti |
GK22vispancu:1266: evam abhidhāya garuḍād avatīrya savye pāṇau gṛhītvā tāṃ sabhayāṃ salajjāṃ vepamānāṃ śayyāyām ānayat |
GK22vispancu:1267: tataś ca rātri-śeṣaṃ yāvad vātsyāyanokta-vidhinā niṣevya pratyūṣe sva-gṛham alakṣito jagāma
GK22vispancu:1268: evaṃ tasya tāṃ nityaṃ sevamānasya kālo yāti |
GK22vispancu:1269: atha kadācit kañcukinas tasyā adharoṣṭha-pravāla-khaṇḍanaṃ dṛṣṭvā mithaḥ procuḥ-aho ! paśyatāsyā
GK22vispancu:1271: tat katham ayaṃ surakṣite'py asmin gṛha evaṃvidho vyavahāraḥ |
GK22vispancu:1273: evaṃ niścitya sarve sametya rājānaṃ procuḥ-deva ! vayaṃ na vidmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1278: putrīti jātā mahatīha cintā kasmai pradeyeti mahān vitarkaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1279: dattvā sukhaṃ prāpsyati vā na veti
GK22vispancu:1283: toyaiś ca doṣaiś ca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulāni nāryaḥ ||Panc_1.223||
GK22vispancu:1284: jananī-mano harati jātavatī parivardhate saha śucā suhṛdām |
GK22vispancu:1285: para-sātkṛtāpi kurute malinaṃ durita-kramā duhitaro vipadaḥ ||Panc_1.224||
GK22vispancu:1286: evaṃ bahu-vidhaṃ vicintya devīṃ rahaḥ-sthāṃ provāca-devi, jñāyatāṃ kim ete
GK22vispancu:1287: kañcukino vadanti ? tasya kṛtāntaḥ kupito yenaitad evaṃ kriyate |
GK22vispancu:1288: devy api tad ākarṇya vyākulī-bhūtā satvaraṃ kanyāntaḥpure gatvā tāṃ khaṇḍitādharāṃ nakha-vilikhita-śarīrāvayavāṃ duhitaram apaśyat |
GK22vispancu:1290: pāpe ! kula-kalaṅka-kāriṇi ! kim eva śīla-khaṇḍanaṃ kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:1294: iti kopāṭopa-visaṅkaṭaṃ vadatyāṃ mātari rāja-putrī bhaya-lajjānatānanaṃ
GK22vispancu:1295: provāca-amba, sākṣān nārāyaṇaḥ pratyahaṃ garuḍārūḍho niśi samāyāti |
GK22vispancu:1296: ced asatyaṃ mama vākyam, tat sva-cakṣuṣā vilokayatu niguḍhatarā niśīthe
GK22vispancu:1298: tac chrutvā sāpi prahasita-vadanā pulakāṅkita-sarvāṅgī satvaraṃ rājānam ūce-deva, diṣṭyā vardhase |
GK22vispancu:1299: nityam eva niśīthe bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ kanyakā-pārśve'bhyeti |
GK22vispancu:1301: tad adya tvayā mayā ca rātrau vātāyana-gatābhyāṃ niśīthe draṣṭavyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1302: yato na sa mānuṣaiḥ sahālāpaṃ karoti |
GK22vispancu:1303: tac chrutvā harṣitasya rājñas tad dinaṃ varṣa-śata-prāyam iva kathañcij jagāma |
GK22vispancu:1304: tatas tu rātrau nibhṛto bhūtvā rājñī-sahito rājā vātāyanas-stho
GK22vispancu:1305: gaganāsakta-dṛṣṭir yāvat tiṣṭhati, tāvat tasmin samaye garuḍārūḍhaṃ taṃ śaṅka-cakra-gadā-padma-hastaṃ yathokta-cihnāṅkitaṃ vyomno 'vatarantaṃ
GK22vispancu:1308: uvāca-priye ! nāsty anyo dhanyataro loke mattas tvattaś ca |
GK22vispancu:1312: jāmātṛ-prabhāveṇa sakalām api vasumatīṃ vaśyāṃ kariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1313: evaṃ niścitya sarvaiḥ sīmādhipaiḥ saha maryādā-vyatikramam akarot |
GK22vispancu:1314: te ca taṃ maryādā-vyatikrameṇa vartamānam ālokya sarve sametya tena saha
GK22vispancu:1316: atrāntare sa rājā devī-mukhena tāṃ duhitaram uvāca-putri, tvayi duhitari vartamānāyāṃ nārāyaṇe bhagavati jāmātari sthite tat kim evaṃ yujyate yat sarve pārthivā mayā saha vigrahaṃ kurvanti tat sambodhyo 'dya tvayā
GK22vispancu:1318: tatas tayā sa kauliko rātrau sa-vinayam abhihitaḥ-bhagavan, tvayi jāmātari sthite mama tāto yac chatrubhiḥ paribhūyate tan na yuktam |
GK22vispancu:1319: tat prasādaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṃs tān śatrūn vyāpādaya |
GK22vispancu:1320: kaulika āha-subhage ! kiyan-mātrās tv ete tava pituḥ śatravaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1323: atha gacchatā kālena sarva-deśaṃ śatrubhir udvāsya sa rājā prākāra-śeṣaḥ
GK22vispancu:1325: tathāpi vāsudeva-rūpa-dharaṃ kaulikam ajānan rāja nityam eva viśeṣataḥ karpūrāguru-kastūrikādi-parimala-viśeṣān
GK22vispancu:1329: yavasendhana-kṣayaḥ sañjātas tathā sarvo 'pi janaḥ prahārair jarjarita-dehaḥ saṃvṛtto yoddhum akṣamaḥ pracuro mṛtaś ca |
GK22vispancu:1330: tad evaṃ jñātvātra kāle yad ucitaṃ bhavati tad vidheyam iti |
GK22vispancu:1331: tac chrutvā kauliko 'py acintayat-sthāna-bhaṅge jāte mamānayā saha viyogo bhaviṣyati æ tasmād garuḍam āruhya sāyudham ātmānam ākāśe darśayāmi |
GK22vispancu:1332: kadācin māṃ vāsudevaṃ manyamānās te sāśaṅkā rājño yoddhṛbhir hanyate |
GK22vispancu:1335: viṣaṃ bhavatu vā mābhūt phaṇāṭopo bhayaṅkaraḥ ||Panc_1.225||
GK22vispancu:1336: atha yadi mama sthānārtham udyatasya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati tad api sundarataram |
GK22vispancu:1339: sthānārthe yas tyajet prāṇāṃs tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ ||Panc_1.226||
GK22vispancu:1341: śaraṇāgatena sārdhaṃ vipad api tejasvinā ślāghyā ||Panc_1.227||
GK22vispancu:1342: evaṃ niścitya pratyūṣe danta-dhāvanaṃ kṛtvā tāṃ provāca-subhage !
GK22vispancu:1343: samastaiḥ śatrubhir hatair annaṃ pānaṃ cāsvādayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1346: paraṃ vācyas tvayātma-pitā yat prabhāte prabhūtena sainyena saha nagarān niṣkramya yoddhavyam
GK22vispancu:1348: cākāśa-sthita eva sarvāṃs tān nistejasaḥ kariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1349: paścāt sukhena bhavatā hantavyāḥ yadi punar ahaṃ tān svayam eva sūdayāmi tat teṣāṃ pāpātmanāṃ vaikuṇṭhīyā gatiḥ syāt |
GK22vispancu:1350: tasmāt te tathā kartavyā yathā palāyanto hanyamānāḥ svargaṃ na gacchanti |
GK22vispancu:1351: sāpi tad ākarṇya pituḥ samīpaṃ gatvā sarvaṃ vṛttāntaṃ nyavedayat |
GK22vispancu:1352: rājāpi tasyā vākyaṃ śraddadhānaḥ pratyūṣe samutthāya samunnaddha-sainyo
GK22vispancu:1357: vainateyaḥ samprāpto vihasya proktaḥ-bho garutman ! jānāsi tvaṃ yan mama rūpeṇa kauliko dāru-maya-garuḍe samārūḍho rāja-kanyāṃ kāmayate |
GK22vispancu:1360: śrī-bhagavān āha-adya kauliko maraṇe kṛta-niścayo vihita-niyamo yuddhārthe vinirgataḥ sa nūnaṃ pradhāna-kṣatriyair militvā vāsudevo garuḍaś ca nipātitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1361: tataḥ paraṃ loko 'yam āvayoḥ pūjāṃ na kariṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1362: tatas tvaṃ drutataraṃ tatra dāru-maya-garuḍe saṅkramaṇaṃ kuru |
GK22vispancu:1365: tataś ca śatru-vadhād āvayor māhātmya-vṛddhiḥ syāt |
GK22vispancu:1366: atha garuḍe tatheti pratipanne śrī-bhagavan-nārāyaṇas tac-charīre
GK22vispancu:1368: tato bhagavan-māhātmyena gagana-sthaḥ sa kaulikaḥ śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-cāpa-cihnitaḥ kṣaṇād eva līlayaiva samastān api pradhāna-kṣatriyān nistejasaś cakārar |
GK22vispancu:1370: sva-sainya-parivṛtena saṅgrāme jitā nihatāś ca te sarve'pi śatravaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1371: jātaś ca loka-madhye pravādo, yathā-anena viṣṇu-jāmātṛ-prabhāveṇa sarve śatravo nihatā iti
GK22vispancu:1372: kauliko 'pi tān hatān dṛṣṭvā pramudita-manā gaganād avatīrṇaḥ san, yāvad
GK22vispancu:1373: rājāmātya-paura-lokās taṃ nagara-vāstavyaṃ kaulikaṃ paśyanti tataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kim etad iti |
GK22vispancu:1374: tataḥ so 'pi mūlād ārabhya sarvaṃ prāg-vṛttāntaṃ nyavedayat
GK22vispancu:1375: | tataś ca kaulika-sāhasānurañjita-manasā śatru-vadhād avāpta-tejasā rājñā sā rāja-kanyā sakala-jana-pratyakṣaṃ vivāha-vidhinā tasmai samarpitā deśaś
GK22vispancu:1380: tac chrutvā karaṭaka āha-bhadra, asty evam |
GK22vispancu:1382: yato buddhimān sañjīvako raudraś ca siṃhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1383: yadyapi te buddhi-prāgalbhyaṃ tathāpi tvaṃ piṅgalakāt taṃ viyojayitum asamartha eva |
GK22vispancu:1386: upāyena hi yac chakyaṃ na tac chakyaṃ parākramaiḥ |
GK22vispancu:1398: anya-vṛkṣa-mūla-nivāsinaṃ priya-suhṛdaṃ śṛgālaṃ gatvocatuḥ-bhadra ! kim evaṃvidhe sañjāta āvayoḥ kartavyaṃ bhavati |
GK22vispancu:1402: yasya kṣetraṃ nadī-tīre bhāryā ca para-saṅgatā |
GK22vispancu:1403: sa-sarpe ca gṛhe vāsaḥ kathaṃ syāt tasya nirvṛtiḥ ||Panc_1.229||
GK22vispancu:1405: sarpa-yukte gṛhe vāso mṛtyur eva na saṃśayaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1406: yad grāmānte vaset sarpas tasya syāt prāṇa-saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_1.230||
GK22vispancu:1408: sa āha-nātra viṣaye svalpo 'pi viṣādaḥ kāryaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1409: nūnaṃ sa lubdho nopāyam antareṇa vadhyaḥ syāt |
GK22vispancu:1410: upāyena jayo yādṛg ripos tādṛṅ na hetibhiḥ |
GK22vispancu:1419: asti kasmiṃścid vana-pradeśe nānā-jala-cara-sanāthaṃ mahat saraḥ |
GK22vispancu:1420: tatra ca kṛtāśrayo baka eko vṛddha-bhāvam upāgato matsyān vyāpādayitum
GK22vispancu:1424: ekaḥ kulīrako nānā-jala-cara-sametaḥ sametya tasya duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ sādaram idam ūce-māma ! kim adya tvayā nāhāra-vṛttir anuṣṭhīyate ? kevalam
GK22vispancu:1429: tenāhaṃ samīpāgatān api matsyān na bhakṣayāmi |
GK22vispancu:1430: kulīrakas tac chrutvā prāha-māma, kiṃ tad vairāgya-kāraṇam ?
GK22vispancu:1431: sa prāha-vatsa, aham asmin sarasi jāto vṛddhiṃ gataś ca |
GK22vispancu:1432: tan mayaitac chrutaṃ yad dvādaśa-varṣikyānāvṛṣṭiḥ sampadyate lagnā |
GK22vispancu:1434: baka āha-daivajña-mukhād eṣa śanaiścaro hi rohiṇī-śakaṭaṃ bhittvā bhaumaṃ śakraṃ ca prayāsyati
GK22vispancu:1436: yadi bhinte sūrya-suto rohiṇyāḥ śakaṭam iha loke |
GK22vispancu:1437: dvādaśa varṣāṇi tadā nahi varṣati vāsavau bhūmau ||Panc_1.233||
GK22vispancu:1439: prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvaiva pātakaṃ vasudhā |
GK22vispancu:1442: rohiṇī-śakaṭam arka-nandanaś ced bhinnatti rudhiro 'thavā śaśī |
GK22vispancu:1451: asmin śuṣke yaiḥ sahāhaṃ vṛddhiṃ gataḥ, sadaiva krīḍitaś ca, te sarve toyābhāvān nāśaṃ yāsyanti
GK22vispancu:1452: tat teṣāṃ viyogaṃ draṣṭum aham asamarthaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1457: atra punaḥ sarasi ye jalacarās te niścintāḥ santi, tenāhaṃ viśeṣād rodimi yad
GK22vispancu:1459: tataḥ sa tad ākarṇyānyeṣām api jalacarāṇāṃ tat tasya vacanaṃ nivedayāmāsa
GK22vispancu:1460: | atha te sarve bhaya-trasta-manaso matsya-kacchapa-prabhṛtayas tam abhyupetya papracchuḥ-māma ! asti kaścid upāyo yenāsmākaṃ rakṣā bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:1461: baka āha-asty asya jalāśayasya nātidūre prabhūta-jala-sanāthaṃ saraḥ
GK22vispancu:1462: padminī-khaṇḍa-maṇḍitaṃ yac caturviṃśaty api varṣāṇām avṛṣṭyā na śoṣam eṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1463: tad yadi mama pṛṣṭhaṃ kaścid ārohati, tad ahaṃ taṃ tatra nayāmi |
GK22vispancu:1464: atha te tatra viśvāsam āpannāḥ, tāta mātula bhrātaḥ iti bruvāṇāḥ ahaṃ
GK22vispancu:1465: pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti samantāt paritasthuḥ |
GK22vispancu:1466: so 'pi duṣṭāśayaḥ krameṇa tān pṛṣṭha āropya jalāśayasya nātidūre śilāṃ samāsādya tasyām
GK22vispancu:1467: svecchayā bhakṣayitvā bhūyo 'pi jalāśayaṃ samāsādya jalacarṇāṇāṃ
GK22vispancu:1468: mithyā-vārtā-sandeśakair manāṃsi rañjayan nityam evāhāra-vṛttim akarot |
GK22vispancu:1469: anyasmin dine ca kulīrakeṇoktaḥ-māma ! mayā saha te prathamaḥ
GK22vispancu:1471: tat kiṃ māṃ parityajyānyān nayasi ? tasmād adya me prāṇa-trāṇaṃ kuru |
GK22vispancu:1472: tad ākarṇya so 'pi duṣṭāśayaś cintitavān-nirviṇṇo 'haṃ matsya-māṃsādanena
GK22vispancu:1474: iti vicintya taṃ pṛṣṭe samāropya tāṃ vadhya-śilām uddiśya prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1476: evāsthi-parvataṃ śilāśrayam avalokya mastyāsthīni parijñāya tam apṛcchat-māma, kiyad dūre sa jalāśayaḥ ? madīya-bhāreṇātiśrāntas tvam |
GK22vispancu:1478: so 'pi manda-dhīr jalacaro 'yam iti matvā sthale na prabhavatīti sa-smitam
GK22vispancu:1479: idam āha-kulīraka, kuto 'nyo jalāśayaḥ ? mama prāṇa-yātreyam |
GK22vispancu:1481: tvām apy anyāṃ śilāyāṃ nikṣipya bhakṣayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:1484: atha sa tāṃ baka-grīvāṃ samādāya śanaiḥ śanais taj jalāśayam āsasāda |
GK22vispancu:1485: tataḥ sarvair eva jalacaraiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ-bhoḥ kulīraka ! kiṃ nivṛttas tvam ? sa mātulo 'pi nāyātaḥ
GK22vispancu:1486: tat kiṃ cirayati ? vayaṃ sarve sotksukāḥ kṛta-kṣaṇās
GK22vispancu:1488: evaṃ tair abhihite kulīrako 'pi vihasyovāca-mūrkhāḥ ! sarve jalacarās tena
GK22vispancu:1489: mithyā-vādinā vañcayitvā nātidūre śilā-tale prakṣipya bhakṣitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1491: mamāyuḥ-śeṣatayā tasya viśvāsa-ghātakasyābhiprāyaṃ jñātvā grīveyam ānītā |
GK22vispancu:1495: vāyasa āha-bhadra ! tat kathaya kathaṃ sa duṣṭa-sarpo vadham upaiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1496: śṛgāla āha-gacchatu bhavān kañcin nagaraṃ rājādhiṣṭhānam |
GK22vispancu:1497: tatra kasyāpi dhanino rājāmātyādeḥ pramādinaḥ kanaka-sūtraṃ hāraṃ vā gṛhītvā tat-koṭare
GK22vispancu:1499: tat-kṣaṇāt kākaḥ kākī ca tad ākarṇyātmecchayotpatitau |
GK22vispancu:1500: tataś ca kākī kiñcit saraḥ prāpya yāvat paśyati, tāvat tan-madhye kasyacid rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ jalāsannaṃ nyasta-kanaka-sūtraṃ mukta-muktāhāra-vastrābharaṇaṃ
GK22vispancu:1502: atha sā vāyasī kanaka-sūtram ekam ādāya sva-gṛhābhimukhaṃ pratasthe |
GK22vispancu:1505: kāky api sarpa-koṭare tat-kanaka-sūtraṃ prakṣipya sudūram avasthitā |
GK22vispancu:1506: atha yāvad rāja-puruṣās taṃ vṛkṣam āruhya tat-koṭaram avalokayanti, tāvat
GK22vispancu:1510: vāyasa-dampatī api tataḥ paraṃ sukhena vasataḥ |
GK22vispancu:1511: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-upāyena hi yat kuryāt iti |
GK22vispancu:1512: tan na kiṃcid iha buddhimatām asādhyam asti |
GK22vispancu:1514: yasya buddhir balaṃ tasya nirbuddhes tu kuto balam |
GK22vispancu:1520: kasmiṃścid vane bhāsurako nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:1521: athāsau vīryātirekān nityam evānekān mṛga-śaśakādīn vyāpādayan nopararāma |
GK22vispancu:1522: athānyedyus tad-vanajāḥ sarve sāraṅga-varāha-mahiṣa-śaśakādayo militvā tam abhyupetya procuḥ-svāmin ! kim anena sakala-mṛga-vadhena nityam eva, yatas tavaikenāpi mṛgeṇa tṛptir bhavati tat kriyatām asmābhiḥ saha
GK22vispancu:1524: adya-prabhṛti tavātropaviṣṭasya jāti-krameṇa pratidinam eko mṛgo bhakṣaṇārthaṃ sameṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1525: evaṃ kṛte tava tāvat prāṇa-yātrā kleśaṃ vināpi bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:1526: asmākaṃ ca punaḥ sarvocchedanaṃ na syāt |
GK22vispancu:1529: śanaiḥ śanaiś ca yo rājyam upabhuṅkte yathā-balam |
GK22vispancu:1530: rasāyanam iva prājñaḥ sa puṣṭiṃ paramāṃ vrajet ||Panc_1.238||
GK22vispancu:1536: pālanāt poṣaṇād grāhyaṃ nyāyyāṃ vṛttiṃ samācaret ||Panc_1.241||
GK22vispancu:1537: ajām iva prajāṃ mohād yo hanyāt pṛthivī-patim |
GK22vispancu:1538: tasyaikā jāyate tṛptir na dvitīyā kathañcana ||Panc_1.242||
GK22vispancu:1539: phalārthī nṛpatir lokān pālayed yatnam āsthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:1542: āntara-sthair guṇaiḥ śubhrair lakṣyate naiva kenacit ||Panc_1.244||
GK22vispancu:1543: yathā gaur duhyate kāle pālyate ca tathā prajāḥ |
GK22vispancu:1546: phala-prado bhavet kāle tadval lokaḥ surakṣitaḥ ||Panc_1.246||
GK22vispancu:1548: tathānyad api yat kiñcit prajābhyaḥ syān mahīpateḥ ||Panc_1.247||

GK22vispancu:2556: ghātayitum eva nīcaḥ para-kāryaṃ vetti na prasādayitum |
GK22vispancu:2557: pātayitum asti śaktir vāyor vṛkṣaṃ na connamitum ||Panc_1.394||
GK22vispancu:2558: damanaka āha-anabhijño bhavān nīti-śāstrasya, tenaitad bravīṣi |
GK22vispancu:2560: jāta-mātraṃ na yaḥ śatruṃ vyādhiṃ ca praśamaṃ nayet |
GK22vispancu:2561: mahā-balo 'pi tenaiva vṛddhiṃ prāpya sa hanyate ||Panc_1.395||
GK22vispancu:2565: sa tasya sahajaḥ śatrur ucchedyo 'pi priye sthitaḥ ||Panc_1.396||
GK22vispancu:2566: tan mayā sa udāsīnatayā samānīto 'bhaya-pradānena yāvat tāvad aham api tena sācivyāt pracyāvitaḥ
GK22vispancu:2568: dadyāt sādhur yadi nija-pade durjanāya praveśaṃ tan-nāśāya prabhavati tato vāñchamānaḥ svayaṃ saḥ |
GK22vispancu:2570: jārāpi syād gṛha-patir iti śrūyate vākyato 'tra ||Panc_1.397||
GK22vispancu:2571: tena mayā tasyopari vadhopāya eva viracyate |
GK22vispancu:2573: tac ca tvāṃ muktvānyo na jñāsyati |
GK22vispancu:2580: aparaṃ sācivyaṃ ca bhaviṣyati tṛptiś ceti |
GK22vispancu:2581: tad-guṇa-traye'sminn upasthite kasmān māṃ dūṣayasi tvaṃ jāḍya-bhāvāt |
GK22vispancu:2583: parasya pīḍanaṃ kurvan svārtha-siddhiṃ ca paṇḍitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2584: mūḍha-buddhir na bhakṣeta vane caturako yathā ||Panc_1.399||
GK22vispancu:2589: asti kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe vajra-daṃṣṭro nāma siṃhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2591: caturaka-kravyamukha-nāmānau śṛgāla-vṛkau bhṛtya-bhūtau sadaivānugatau tatraiva vane prativasataḥ
GK22vispancu:2593: prasava-vedanayā sva-yūthād bhraṣṭoṣṭry upaviṣṭā kasmiṃścid vana-gahane
GK22vispancu:2595: atha tāṃ vyāpādya yāvad udaraṃ sphoṭayati, tāvaj jīvan laghu-dāseraka-śiśur niṣkrāntaḥ
GK22vispancu:2596: siṃho 'pi dāserakyāḥ piśitena saparivāraḥ parāṃ tṛptim upāgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2597: paraṃ snehād bāla-dāsekaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛham ānīyedam uvāca-bhadra, na te'sti mṛtyor bhayaṃ matto nānyasmād api |
GK22vispancu:2601: evam anuṣṭhite catvāro 'pi na eka-sthāne vihāriṇaḥ parasparam aneka-prakāra-goṣṭhī-sukham anubhavantas tiṣṭhanti |
GK22vispancu:2603: yauvana-padavīm ārūḍhaḥ kṣaṇam api na taṃ siṃhaṃ muñcati |
GK22vispancu:2604: atha kadācid vajra-daṃṣṭrasya kenacid vanyena matta-gajena saha yuddham abhavat |
GK22vispancu:2605: tena mada-vīryāt sa danta-prahārais tathā kṣata-śarīro vihito yathā pracalituṃ na śaknoti
GK22vispancu:2607: anviṣyatāṃ kiñcit sattvaṃ yenāham evaṃ sthito 'pi taṃ vyāpādyātmano yuṣmākaṃ ca kṣut-praṇāśaṃ karomi |
GK22vispancu:2608: tac chrutvā te trayo 'pi vane sandhyā-kālaṃ yāvad bhrāntāḥ, paraṃ na kiñcit sattvam āsāditam
GK22vispancu:2610: vyāpādyeta tataḥ sarveṣāṃ katicid dināni tṛptir bhavati |
GK22vispancu:2611: paraṃ nainaṃ svāmī mitratvād āśraya-samāśritatvāc ca vināśayiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:2613: buddhi-prabhāveṇa svāminaṃ pratibodhya tathā kariṣye yathā vyāpādayiṣyati
GK22vispancu:2616: loke buddhimatām atra tasmāt tāṃ yojayāmy aham ||Panc_1.400||
GK22vispancu:2617: evaṃ vicintya śaṅkukarṇam idam āha-bhoḥ śaṅkukarṇa ! svāmī tāvat pathyaṃ
GK22vispancu:2619: svāmya-bhāvād asmākam api dhruvaṃ vināśa eva |
GK22vispancu:2622: śaṅkukarṇa āha-bhoḥ śīghraṃ nivedyatāṃ, yena te vacanaṃ śīghraṃ nirvikalpaṃ karomi |
GK22vispancu:2623: aparaṃ svāminohite kṛte mayā sukṛta-śataṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:2624: atha caturaka āha-bho bhadra ! ātma-śarīraṃ dviguṇa-lābhena svāmine
GK22vispancu:2625: prayaccha, yena te dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ bhavati |
GK22vispancu:2628: tad ākarṇya śaṅkukarṇaḥ prāha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tan madīya-prayojanam
GK22vispancu:2633: tataś caturaka āha-deva ! na kiñcit sattvaṃ prāptam |
GK22vispancu:2635: tad yadi svāmī dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ prayacchati |
GK22vispancu:2638: siṃha āha-bhoḥ, yady evaṃ tat sundarataram |
GK22vispancu:2642: atha vajra-daṃṣṭraś caturakam āha-bhoś caturaka ! yāvad ahaṃ nadīṃ gatvā snānaṃ devatārcana-vidhiṃ kṛtvāgacchāmi, tāvat tvayātrāpamattena bhāvyam
GK22vispancu:2644: atha tasmin gate caturakaś cintayāmāsa-kathaṃ mamaikākino bhojyo 'yam
GK22vispancu:2645: uṣṭro bhaviṣyati iti vicintya kravyamukham āha-bhoḥ kravyamukha !
GK22vispancu:2647: tad yāvad asau svāmī nāgacchati, tāvat tvam asyoṣṭrasya
GK22vispancu:2650: so 'pi tac chrutvā yāvat kiñcin māṃsam āsvādayati tāvac
GK22vispancu:2652: tat tyaktvainaṃ dūre tiṣṭha, yenāsya bhakṣaṇaṃ na vikalpayati |
GK22vispancu:2653: tathānuṣṭhite siṃhaḥ samāyāto yāvad uṣṭraṃ paśyati tāvad riktīkṛta-hṛdayo
GK22vispancu:2655: tato bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā paruṣataram āha-aho kenaiṣa uṣṭra ucchiṣṭatāṃ nīto, yena tam api vyāpādayāmi
GK22vispancu:2657: atha caturako vihasyovāca-bhoḥ ! mām anādṛtya piśitaṃ bhakṣayitvādhunā man-mukham
GK22vispancu:2660: tad ākarṇya kravyamukho jīva-nāśa-bhayād dūra-deśaṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2661: etasminn antare tena mārgeṇa dāseraka-sārtho bhārākrāntaḥ samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2664: ākarṇya siṃho jambukam āha-bhadra, jñāyatāṃ kim eṣa raudraḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate'śruta-pūrvaḥ
GK22vispancu:2665: tac chrutvā, caturakaḥ kiñcid vanāntaraṃ gatvā satvaram abhyupetya
GK22vispancu:2666: provāca-svāmin ! gamyatāṃ gamyatāṃ yadi śaknoṣi gantum |
GK22vispancu:2669: iti caturaka āha-svāmin, eṣa dharmarājas tavopari kupitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2673: iti niścitya bṛhan-mānam ādāyāgresarasyoṣṭrasya grīvāyāṃ ghaṇṭāṃ baddhvā badhya-dāseraka-saktān api pitṛ-pitāmahān ādāya
GK22vispancu:2675: siṃho 'pi tac chrutvā sarvato dūrād evāvalokya mṛtam uṣṭraṃ parityajya prāṇa-bhayāt praṇaṣṭaḥ
GK22vispancu:2676: caturako 'pi śanaiḥ śanais tasyoṣṭrasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayāmāsa |
GK22vispancu:2678: atha damanake gate sañjīvakaś cintayāmāsa-aho kim etan mayā kṛtam ? yac chaṣpādo 'pi māṃsāśitas tasyānugaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2680: agamyāni pumān yāti yo 'sevyāṃś ca niṣevate |
GK22vispancu:2681: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā ||Panc_1.401||
GK22vispancu:2682: tat kiṃ karomi ? kva gacchāmi ? kathaṃ me śāntir bhaviṣyati ? athavā tam eva piṅgalakaṃ gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:2686: dharmārthaṃ yatatām apīha vipado devād yadi syuḥ kvacit tat tāsām upaśāntaye sumatibhiḥ kāryo viśeṣān nayaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2687: loke khyātim upāgatātra sakale lokoktir eṣā yato dagdhānāṃ kila vahninā hita-karaḥ seko 'pi tasyodbhavaḥ ||Panc_1.402||
GK22vispancu:2691: bhāvārjitaṃ śubham athāpy aśubhaṃ nikāmaṃ yad bhāvi tad bhavati nātra vicāra-hetuḥ ||Panc_1.403||
GK22vispancu:2692: aparaṃ cānyatra gatasyāpi me kasyacid duṣṭa-sattvasya māṃsāśinaḥ sakāśān mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
GK22vispancu:2698: mahato 'pi kṣayaṃ labdhvā ślāghyaṃ nīco 'pi gacchati |
GK22vispancu:2700: evaṃ niścitya sa sthalita-gatiṃ mandaṃ gatvā siṃhāśrayaṃ paśyann
GK22vispancu:2702: antar-līna-bhujaṅgamaṃ gṛham ivāntaḥsthogra-siṃhaṃ vanaṃ grāhākīrṇam ivābhirāma-kamala-cchāyā-sanāthaṃ saraḥ |
GK22vispancu:2704: duḥkhena pravigāhyate sa-cakitaṃ rājñāṃ manaḥ sāmayam ||Panc_1.406||
GK22vispancu:2705: evaṃ paṭhan damanakoktākāraṃ piṅgalakaṃ dṛṣṭvā pracakitaḥ saṃvṛta-śarīro
GK22vispancu:2707: piṅgalako 'pi tathāvidhaṃ taṃ vilokya damanaka-vākyaṃ śraddadhānaḥ kopāt tasyopari papāta
GK22vispancu:2709: ullikhya katham api tasmād apetaḥ śṛṅgābhyāṃ hantum icchan yuddhāyāvasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2711: paraspara-vadha-kāṅkṣiṇau dṛṣṭvā karaṭako damanakam āha-bho mūḍha-mate !
GK22vispancu:2712: anayor virodhaṃ vitanvatā tvayā sādhu na kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:2716: kāryāṇy uttama-daṇḍa-sāhasa-phalāny āyāsa-sādhyāni ye prītyā saṃśamayanti
GK22vispancu:2718: niḥsārālpa-phalāni ye tv avidhinā vāñchanti daṇḍodyamais teṣāṃ durnaya-ceṣṭitair narapater āropyate śrīs tulām ||Panc_1.407||
GK22vispancu:2719: tad yadi svāmy-abhighāto bhaviṣyati tat kiṃ tavdīya-mantra-buddhyā kriyate
GK22vispancu:2720: | atha sañjīvako na badhyate tathāpy abhavyam |
GK22vispancu:2722: tan mūḍha ! kathaṃ tvaṃ mantri-padam abhilaṣasi |
GK22vispancu:2728: teṣāṃ daṇḍas tu pāpīyāṃs taṃ paścād viniyojayet ||Panc_1.408||
GK22vispancu:2730: sāmnaiva yatra siddhir na tatra daṇḍo budhena viniyojyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2731: pittaṃ yadi śarkarayā śāmyati ko 'rthaḥ paṭolena ||Panc_1.409||
GK22vispancu:2734: sāma-sādhyāni kāryāṇi vikriyāṃ yānti na kvacit ||Panc_1.410||
GK22vispancu:2735: na candreṇa na cāuṣadhyā na sūryeṇa na vahninā |
GK22vispancu:2737: tathā yat tvaṃ mantritvam abhilaṣasi, tad apy ayuktam |
GK22vispancu:2744: ekatamasya kiṃ vā dvayor api vinipātaḥ samutpadyate lagnaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2745: tad yadi kācic chaktir asti tad vicintyatāṃ vinipāta-pratīkāraḥ |
GK22vispancu:2748: tan mūrkha ! tat kartum asamarthatvaṃ yato
GK22vispancu:2752: karmaṇi vyajyate prajñā susthe ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ ||Panc_1.412||
GK22vispancu:2754: ghātayitum eva nīcaḥ para-kāryaṃ vetti na prasādhayitum |
GK22vispancu:2765: tad yadi tvam asya mantrī bhaviṣyasi tadānyo 'pi kaścin nāsya samīpe
GK22vispancu:2770: tathā ca śiṣṭa-jana-rahitasya svāmino 'pi nāśo bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:2773: ye ramante nṛpās teṣāṃ ramante ripavaḥ śriyā ||Panc_1.416||
GK22vispancu:2777: nānāmyaṃ namate dāru nāśmani syāt kṣura-kriyā |
GK22vispancu:2789: atha sucīmukho nāma pakṣī teṣāṃ taṃ vṛthāyāsamavalokya provāca-bhoḥ, sarve mūrkhā yūyam |
GK22vispancu:2796: atha teṣām ekatamo vṛddha-vānaras tam uvāca-bho mūrkha ! kiṃ tāvad anena
GK22vispancu:2804: samālāpena yo yuṅkte sa gacchati parābhavam ||Panc_1.419||
GK22vispancu:2805: so 'pi tam anādṛtya bhūyo 'pi vānarān anavaratam āha-bhoḥ ! kiṃ vṛthā kleśena ? atha yāvad asau na kathañcit pralapan viramati tāvad ekena
GK22vispancu:2806: vānareṇa vyartha-śramatvāt kupitena pakṣābhyāṃ gṛhītvā śilāyām āsphālita uparataś ca |
GK22vispancu:2807: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-nānamyaṃ namate dāru ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:2809: upadeśo hi mūrkhāṇāṃ prakopāya na śāntaye |
GK22vispancu:2812: upadeśo na dātavyo yādṛśe tādṛśe nare |
GK22vispancu:2822: vātāsāra-samāhataḥ proddhūṣita-śarīro dantavīṇāṃ vādayan vepamānas tasyāḥ śamyā mūlam āsādyopaviṣṭaḥ
GK22vispancu:2823: atha taṃ tādṛṣam avalokya caṭakā prāha-bho
GK22vispancu:2826: śītena bhidyase mūḍha kathaṃ na kuruṣe gṛham ||Panc_1.422||
GK22vispancu:2827: etac chrutvā tāṃ vānaraḥ sakopam āha-adhame kasmān na tvaṃ mauna-vratā
GK22vispancu:2831: nāśaṅkate prajalpantī tat kim enāṃ na hanmy aham ||Panc_1.423||
GK22vispancu:2832: evaṃ pralapya tām āha-mugdhe ! kiṃ mama cintayā tava prayojanam ? uktaṃ
GK22vispancu:2838: sa tāvat tāṃ śamīm āruhya tasyāḥ kulāyaṃ śatadhā khaṇḍaśo 'karot |
GK22vispancu:2841: tan mūrkha ! śikṣāpito 'pi na śikṣitas tvam |
GK22vispancu:2843: yataḥ sādhoḥ śikṣā guṇāya sampadyate, nāsādhoḥ |
GK22vispancu:2845: kiṃ karoty eva pāṇḍityam asthāne viniyojitam |
GK22vispancu:2847: tad-vyartha-pāṇḍityam āśritya mama vacanam aśṛṇvann ātmanaḥ śāntim api vetsi |
GK22vispancu:2850: jātaḥ putro 'nujātaś ca atijātas tathaiva ca |
GK22vispancu:2852: mātṛ-tulya-guṇo jātas tv anujātaḥ pituḥ samaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2854: apy ātmano vināśaṃ gaṇayati na khalaḥ para-vyasana-hṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2857: dharma-buddhiḥ kubuddhiś ca dvāv etau viditau mama |
GK22vispancu:2863: kasmiṃścid deśe dharmabuddhiḥ pāpabuddhiś ca dve mitre prativasataḥ |
GK22vispancu:2864: atha kadācit pāpabuddhinā cintitaṃ yad-ahaṃ tāvan mūrkho dāridryopetaś ca |
GK22vispancu:2865: tad enaṃ dharmabuddhim ādāya deśāntaraṃ gatvā asyāśrayeṇārthopārjanāṃ kṛtvainam api vañcayitvā sukhībhavāmi |
GK22vispancu:2866: athānyasminn ahani pāpabuddhir dharmabuddhiṃ prāha-bho mitra !
GK22vispancu:2871: bhramatā dharaṇī-pīṭhe tasya phalaṃ janmano vyartham ||Panc_1.430||
GK22vispancu:2873: vidyāṃ vittaṃ śilpaṃ tāvan nāpnoti mānavaḥ samyak |
GK22vispancu:2874: yāvad vrajati na bhūmau deśād deśāntaraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ ||Panc_1.431||
GK22vispancu:2875: atha tasya tad-vacanam ākarṇya prahṛṣṭa-manās tenaiva saha guru-janānujñātaḥ śubhe'hani deśāntaraṃ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2876: tatra ca dharmabuddhi-prabhāveṇa bhramatā pāpabuddhinā prabhūtataraṃ vittam āsāditam |
GK22vispancu:2877: tataś ca tau dvāv api prabhūtopārjita-dravyau prahṛṣṭau
GK22vispancu:2883: ! na sarvam etad dhanaṃ gṛhaṃ prati netuṃ yujyate |
GK22vispancu:2885: tad atraiva vana-gahane kvāpi bhūmau nikṣipya kiñcin mātram ādāya gṛhaṃ praviśāvaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2886: bhūyo 'pi prayojane sañjāte tan-mātraṃ sametyāsmāt sthānān neṣyāvaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2888: na vittaṃ darśayet prājñaḥ kasyacit svalpam apy aho |
GK22vispancu:2889: muner api yatas tasya darśanāc calate manaḥ ||Panc_1.433||
GK22vispancu:2891: yathāmiṣaṃ jale matsyair bhakṣyate śvāpadair bhuvi |
GK22vispancu:2892: ākāśe pakṣibhiś caiva tathā sarvatra vittavān ||Panc_1.434||
GK22vispancu:2893: tad ākarṇya dharmabuddhir āha-bhadra evaṃ kriyatām |
GK22vispancu:2894: tathānuṣṭhite dvāv api tau sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā sukhena saṃsthitavantau |
GK22vispancu:2895: athānyasminn ahani pāpabuddhir niśīthe'ṭavyāṃ gatvā tat sarvaṃ vittaṃ samādāya gartaṃ
GK22vispancu:2897: athānyedyur dharmabuddhiṃ sametya provāca-sakhe bahu-kuṭumbā vayaṃ vittābhāvāt sīdāmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2898: tad gatvā tatra sthāne kiṃcin mātraṃ dhanam ānayāvaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2900: atha dvāv api gatvā tat sthānaṃ yāvat khanatas tāvad riktaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dṛṣṭavantau |
GK22vispancu:2901: atrāntare pāpabuddhiḥ śiras tāḍayan provāca-bho dharmabuddhe
GK22vispancu:2906: sa āha-bho durātman ! mā maivaṃ vada |
GK22vispancu:2913: evaṃ dvāv api vivadamānau dharmādhikāriṇaṃ gatau ? procatuś ca parasparaṃ
GK22vispancu:2915: atha dharmādhikaraṇādhiṣṭhita-puruṣair divyārthaṃ yāvan niyojitau tāvat pāpabuddhir āha-
GK22vispancu:2919: sākṣy abhāvāt tato divyaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ||Panc_1.436||
GK22vispancu:2920: tad atra viṣaye mama vṛkṣa-devatāḥ sākṣi-bhūtās tiṣṭhanti |
GK22vispancu:2921: tā apy āvayor ekataraṃ cauraṃ sādhuṃ vā kariṣyanti |
GK22vispancu:2926: na tatra yujyate divyaṃ kiṃ punar vana-devatāḥ ||Panc_1.437||
GK22vispancu:2927: tad asmākam apy atra viṣaye mahat kautūhalam vartate |
GK22vispancu:2929: yuvābhyām apy asmābhiḥ saha tatra vanoddeśe gantavyam iti |
GK22vispancu:2930: etasminn antare pāpabuddhiḥ sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā sva-janakam uvāca-tāta, prabhūto 'yaṃ
GK22vispancu:2932: sa ca tava vacanena pariṇatiṃ gacchati |
GK22vispancu:2934: sa āha-vatsa, drutaṃ vada yena procya tad dravyaṃ sthiratāṃ nayāmi |
GK22vispancu:2939: satya-śrāvaṇaṃ karomi, tadā tvayā vācyaṃ yad dharmabuddhiś caura iti |
GK22vispancu:2941: dharmādhikaraṇakaiḥ. saha tāṃ śamīm abhyetya tāra-svareṇa provāca |
GK22vispancu:2942: ādityacandrāv anilo 'nalaś ca dyaur bhūmir āpo hṛdayaṃ yamaś ca |
GK22vispancu:2943: ahaś ca rātriś ca ubhe ca sandhye dharmo hi jānāti narasya vṛttam ||Panc_1.438||
GK22vispancu:2944: bhagavati vana-devate ! āvayor madhye yaś caura tat kathayata |
GK22vispancu:2945: atha pāpabuddhi-pitā śamī-koṭara-sthaḥ provāca-bho, dharmabuddhinā hṛtam etad dhanam |
GK22vispancu:2946: tad ākarṇya sarve te rāja-puruṣā vismayotphulla-locanā yāvad dharmabuddher vitta-haraṇocitaṃ nigrahaṃ śāstra-dṛṣṭyāvalokayanti tāvad dharmabuddhinā tac chamī-koṭaraṃ vahni-bhojya-dravyaiḥ pariveṣṭya vahninā sandīpitam |
GK22vispancu:2947: atha jvalati tasmin śamī-koṭare'rdha-dagdha-śarīraḥ sphuṭitekṣaṇaḥ karuṇaṃ paridevayan pāpabuddhi-pitā niścakrāma |
GK22vispancu:2950: ity ukte idaṃ sarvaṃ kukṛtyaṃ pāpabuddheḥ kāraṇāj jātam ity uktvā mṛtaḥ |
GK22vispancu:2951: tatas te rāja-puruṣāḥ pāpabuddhiṃ śamī-śākhāyāṃ pratilambya dharmabuddhiṃ praśaṃsyedam
GK22vispancu:2953: upāyaṃ cintayet prājñas tathāpāyam api cintayet |
GK22vispancu:2961: sa ca baka-bālakān ajāta-pakṣān api sadaiva bhakṣayan kālaṃ nayati |
GK22vispancu:2962: athaiko bakas tena bhakṣitāny apatyāni dṛṣṭvā
GK22vispancu:2965: taṃ ca tādṛk-ceṣṭitam avalokya kulīrakaḥ provāca-māma kim evaṃ rudyate bhavatādya ?
GK22vispancu:2966: sa āha-bhadra kiṃ karomi ? mama manda-bhāgyasya bālakāḥ koṭara-nivāsinā
GK22vispancu:2969: tat kathaya me yady asti kaścid upāyas tad-vināśāya |
GK22vispancu:2970: tad ākarṇya kulīrakaś cintayāmāsa-ayaṃ tāvad asmat-sahaja-vairī |
GK22vispancu:2971: tathopadeśaṃ prayacchāmi satyānṛtaṃ yathānye'pi bakāḥ sarve saṅkṣayam
GK22vispancu:2974: navanīta-samāṃ vāṇīṃ kṛtvā cittaṃ tu nirdayam |
GK22vispancu:2975: tathā prabodhyate śatruḥ sānvayo mriyate yathā ||Panc_1.440||
GK22vispancu:2976: āha ca-māma, yady evaṃ tan matsya-māṃsa-khaṇḍāni nakulasya bila-dvārāt
GK22vispancu:2977: sarpa-koṭaraṃ yāvat prakṣipa yathā nakulas tan-mārgeṇa gatvā taṃ duṣṭa-sarpaṃ vināśayati
GK22vispancu:2978: atha tathānuṣṭhite matsya-māṃsānusāriṇā nakulena taṃ kṛṣṇa-sarpaṃ nihatya
GK22vispancu:2979: te'pi tad-vṛkṣāśrayāḥ sarve bakāś ca śanaiḥ śanair bhakṣitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:2981: evaṃ mūḍha ! tvayāpy apāyaś cintito nopāyaḥ pāpa-buddhivat |
GK22vispancu:2986: prakaṭīkṛtaṃ tvayā svayam evātmano duṣṭatvaṃ kauṭilyaṃ ca |
GK22vispancu:2988: yatnād api kaḥ paśyec chikhinām āhāra-niḥsaraṇa-mārgam |
GK22vispancu:2989: yadi jalada-dhvani-muditās ta eva mūḍhā na nṛtyeyuḥ ||Panc_1.441||
GK22vispancu:2990: yadi tvaṃ svāminam enāṃ daśāṃ nayasi tad asmad-vidhasya kā gaṇanā ? tasmān mamāsannena bhavatā na bhāvyam |
GK22vispancu:2993: rājaṃs tatra harec chyeno bālakaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_1.442||
GK22vispancu:2998: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne jīrṇadhano nāma vaṇik-putraḥ |
GK22vispancu:3000: yatra deśe atha vā sthāne bhogān bhuktvā svavīryataḥ |
GK22vispancu:3001: tasmin vibhavahīno yo vaset sa puruṣādhamaḥ ||Panc_1.443||
GK22vispancu:3004: dīnaṃ vadati tatraiva yaḥ pareṣāṃ sa ninditaḥ ||Panc_1.444||
GK22vispancu:3005: tasya ca gṛhe sahasra-loha-bhāra-ghaṭitā pūrva-puruṣopārjitā tulāsīt |
GK22vispancu:3006: tāṃ ca kasyacid chreṣṭino gṛhe nikṣepa-bhūtāṃ kṛtvā deśāntaraṃ prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3007: tataḥ suciraṃ kālaṃ deśāntaraṃ yathecchayā bhrāntvā punaḥ sva-puram āgatya taṃ śreṣṭhinam uvāca-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin ! dīyatāṃ me sā nikṣepa-tulā |
GK22vispancu:3008: sa āha-bho ! nāsti sā tvadīyā tulā |
GK22vispancu:3010: jīrṇadhana āha-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin ! nāsti doṣas te yadi mūṣikair bhakṣiteti |
GK22vispancu:3014: tat tvam ātmīyaṃ śiśum enaṃ dhanadeva-nāmānaṃ mayā saha snānopakaraṇa-hastaṃ preṣayeti |
GK22vispancu:3015: so 'pi caurya-bhayāt tasya śaṅkitaḥ sva-putram uvāca-vatsa, pitṛvyo 'yaṃ
GK22vispancu:3017: tad gamyatām anena sārdhaṃ snānopakaraṇam ādāyeti |
GK22vispancu:3019: na bhaktyā kasyacit ko 'pi priyaṃ prakurute naraḥ |
GK22vispancu:3020: muktvā bhayaṃ pralobhaṃ vā kārya-kāraṇam eva vā ||Panc_1.445||
GK22vispancu:3024: athāsau vaṇik-śiśuḥ snānopakaraṇam ādāya prahṛṣṭa-manās tenābhyāgatena saha prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3025: tathānuṣṭhite vaṇik snātvā taṃ śiśuṃ nadī-guhāyāṃ
GK22vispancu:3026: prakṣipya tad-dvāraṃ bṛhac-chilayācchādya satvaraṃ gṛham āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:3027: pṛṣṭaś ca tena vaṇijā-bho 'bhyāgata tat kathyatāṃ kutra me śiśur yas tvayā saha nadīṃ gataḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:3028: sa āha-nadī-taṭāt sa śyenena hṛta iti |
GK22vispancu:3029: śreṣṭhy āha-mithyā-vādin ! kiṃ kvacic chyeno bālaṃ hartuṃ śaknoti ? tat samarpaya me sutam, anyathā rāja-kule nivedayiṣyāmīti |
GK22vispancu:3030: sa āha-bhoḥ satyavādin ! yathā śyeno bālaṃ na nayati tathā mūṣikā api loha-bhāra-ghaṭitāṃ tulāṃ na bhakṣayanti |
GK22vispancu:3031: tad arpaya me tulāṃ yadi dārakeṇa prayojanam |
GK22vispancu:3032: evaṃ vivadamānau dvāv api rāja-kulaṃ gatau |
GK22vispancu:3035: atha dharmādhikāriṇas tam ūcuḥ-bhoḥ samarpyatāṃ śreṣṭhi-sutaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3036: sa āha-kiṃ karomi ? paśyato me nadī-taṭāc chyenenāpahṛtaḥ śiśuḥ |
GK22vispancu:3037: tac chrutvā te procuḥ-bho na satyam abhihitaṃ bhavatā |
GK22vispancu:3038: kiṃ śyenaḥ śiśuṃ hartuṃ samartho bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:3041: rājaṃs tatra harec chyeno bālakaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_1.447||
GK22vispancu:3043: tataḥ śreṣṭhī sabhyānām agre sarvaṃ vṛttāntaṃ nivedayāmāsa |
GK22vispancu:3044: tatas tair vihasya dvāv api tau parasparaṃ sambodhya tulā-śiśu-pradānena santoṣitau |
GK22vispancu:3046: tan mūrkha ! sañjīvaka-prasādam asahamānena tvayaitat kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:3048: prāyeṇātra kulānvitaṃ kukulajāḥ śrī-vallabhaṃ durbhagā dātāraṃ kṛpaṇā ṛjūn anṛjavo vitte sthitaṃ nirdhanāḥ |
GK22vispancu:3049: vairūpyopahṛtāś ca kānta-vapuṣaṃ dharmāśrayaṃ pāpino nānā-śāstra-vicakṣaṇaṃ ca puruṣaṃ nindanti mūrkhāḥ sadā ||Panc_1.448||
GK22vispancu:3053: tan mūrkha tvayā hitam apy ahitaṃ kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:3055: paṇḍito 'pi varaṃ śatrur na mūrkho hita-kārakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3056: vānareṇa hato rājā viprāś cīreṇa rakṣitāḥ ||Panc_1.450||
GK22vispancu:3062: ekadā rājño nidrāṃ gatasya vānare vyajanaṃ nītvā vāyuṃ vidadhati rājño vakṣaḥ-sthalopari
GK22vispancu:3064: vyajanena muhur muhur niṣidhyamānāpi punaḥ punas tatra evopaviśati |
GK22vispancu:3065: tatas tena svabhāva-capalena mūrkheṇa vānareṇa kruddhena
GK22vispancu:3066: satā tīkṣṇaṃ khaḍgam ādāya tasyā upari prahāro vihitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3067: tato makṣikoḍḍīya gatā, paraṃ tena śita-dhāreṇāsinā rājño vakṣo dvidhā jātaṃ rājā mṛtaś ca |
GK22vispancu:3068: tasmāc cirāyur icchatā nṛpeṇa mūrkho 'nucaro na rakṣaṇīyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3069: aparam ekasmin nagare ko 'pi vipro mahā-vidvān paraṃ pūrva-janma-yogena
GK22vispancu:3071: tasmin pure'nya-deśād āgatāṃś caturo viprān bahūni vastūni vikrīṇato dṛṣṭvā cintitavān-aho kenopāyenaiṣāṃ dhanaṃ labhe |
GK22vispancu:3072: iti vicintya teṣāṃ puro 'nekāni śāstroktāni subhāṣitāni cātipriyāṇi madhurāṇi vacanāni jalpatā teṣāṃ manasi viśvāsam utpādya sevā kartum ārabdhā |
GK22vispancu:3074: asatī bhavati salajjā kṣāraṃ nīraṃ ca śītalaṃ bhavati |
GK22vispancu:3075: dambhī bhavati vivekī priyavaktā bhavati dhūrtajanaḥ ||Panc_1.451||
GK22vispancu:3076: atha tasmin sevāṃ kurvati tair vipraiḥ sarva-vastūni vikrīya bahu-mūlyāni
GK22vispancu:3080: tataḥ sa dhūrta-vipras tān viprān gantum udyatān prekṣya cintā-vyākulita-manāḥ saṃjātaḥ-
GK22vispancu:3081: aho dhanam etan na kiṃcin mama caṭitam |
GK22vispancu:3083: pathi kvāpi viṣaṃ dattvaitān nihatya sarva-ratnāni gṛhṇāmi |
GK22vispancu:3085: sa-karuṇaṃ vilapyedam āha-bho mitrāṇi ! yūyaṃ mām ekākinaṃ muktvā gantum udyatāḥ |
GK22vispancu:3086: tan me mano bhavadbhiḥ saha sneha-pāśena baddhaṃ
GK22vispancu:3087: bhavad-viraha-nāmnaivākulaṃ sañjātaṃ yathā dhṛtiṃ kvāpi na dhatte |
GK22vispancu:3088: yūyam anugrahaṃ vidhāya sahāya-bhūtaṃ mām api sahaiva nayata |
GK22vispancu:3089: tad-vacaḥ śrutvā te karuṇārdra-cittās tena samam eva sva-deśaṃ prati prasthitāḥ |
GK22vispancu:3090: athādhvani teṣāṃ pañcānām api pallī-pura-madhye vrajatāṃ dhvāṅkṣāḥ kathayitum ārabdhāḥ-re re kirātāḥ ! dhāvata dhāvata |
GK22vispancu:3093: tataḥ kirātair dhvāṅkṣa-vacanam ākarṇya satvaraṃ gatvā te viprā laguḍa-prahārair jarjarī-kṛtya vastrāṇi mocayitvā vilokitāḥ, paraṃ dhanaṃ kiṃcin na labdham |
GK22vispancu:3094: tadā taiḥ kirātair abhihitam-bhoḥ pānthāḥ ! purā kadāpi dhvāṅkṣa-vacanam anṛtaṃ nāsīt |
GK22vispancu:3095: tato bhavatāṃ saṃnidhau kvāpi dhanaṃ vidyate tad arpayata |
GK22vispancu:3096: anyathā sarveṣām api vadhaṃ vidhāya carma vidārya pratyaṅgaṃ prekṣya dhanaṃ neṣyāmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3097: tadā teṣām īdṛśaṃ vacanam ākarṇya caura-vipreṇa manasi cintitam-yadaiṣāṃ
GK22vispancu:3098: viprāṇāṃ vadhaṃ vidhāyāṅgaṃ vilokya ratnāni neṣyanti, tadāpi māṃ vadhiṣyanti tato 'haṃ pūrvam evātmānam aratnaṃ samarpyaitān muñcāmi |
GK22vispancu:3100: mṛtyor bibheṣi kiṃ bāla na sa bhītaṃ vimuñcati |
GK22vispancu:3101: adya vābda-śatānte vā mṛtyur vai prāṇināṃ dhruvaḥ ||Panc_1.452||
GK22vispancu:3103: gavārthe brāhmaṇārthe ca prāṇa-tyāgaṃ karoti yaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3104: sūryasya maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||Panc_1.453||
GK22vispancu:3105: iti niścityābhihitaṃ-bhoḥ kirātāḥ ! yady evaṃ tato māṃ pūrvaṃ nihatya
GK22vispancu:3107: tatas tais tathānuṣṭhite taṃ dhana-rahitam avalokyāpare catvāro 'pi muktāḥ |
GK22vispancu:3109: athaivaṃ saṃvadatoḥ sañjīvakaḥ kṣaṇam ekaṃ pīṅgalakena saha yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tasya khara-nakhara-prahārābhihito gatāsur vasundharā-pīṭhe nipapāta |
GK22vispancu:3110: atha taṃ gatāsum avalokya piṅgalakas tad-guṇa-smaraṇārdra-hṛdayaḥ
GK22vispancu:3111: provāca-bhoḥ, ayuktaṃ mayā pāpena kṛtaṃ sañjīvakaṃ vyāpādayatā |
GK22vispancu:3115: mitra-drohī kṛtaghnaś ca yaś ca viśvāsa-ghātakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3116: te narā narakaṃ yānti yāvac candra-divākarau ||Panc_1.454||
GK22vispancu:3117: bhūmi-kṣaye rāja-vināśa eva bhṛtyasya vā buddhimato vināśe |
GK22vispancu:3118: no yuktam uktaṃ hy anayoḥ samatvaṃ naṣṭāpi bhūmiḥ sulabhā na bhṛtyāḥ ||Panc_1.455||
GK22vispancu:3119: tathā mayā sabhā-madhye sa sadaiva praśaṃsitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3122: ukto bhavati yaḥ pūrvaṃ guṇavān iti saṃsadi |
GK22vispancu:3124: evaṃ-vidhaṃ pralapantaṃ damanakaḥ sametya saharṣam idam āha-deva,
GK22vispancu:3125: kātaratamas tavaiṣa nyāyo yad droha-kāriṇaṃ śaṣpa-bhujaṃ hatvetthaṃ śocasi |
GK22vispancu:3128: pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro bhāryāthavā suhṛt |
GK22vispancu:3129: prāṇa-drohaṃ yadā gacched dhantavyo nāsti pātakam ||Panc_1.457||
GK22vispancu:3133: preṣyaḥ pratīpo 'dhikṛtaḥ prasādī tyājyā amī yaś ca kṛtaṃ na vetti ||Panc_1.458||
GK22vispancu:3135: satyānṛtā ca paruṣā priya-vādinī ca hiṃsrā dayālur api cārtha-parā vadānyā |
GK22vispancu:3136: bhūri-vyathā pracura-vitta-samāgamā ca veśyāṅganeva nṛpa-nītir aneka-rūpā ||Panc_1.459||
GK22vispancu:3138: akṛtopadravaḥ kaścin mahān api na pūjyate |
GK22vispancu:3139: pūjayanti narā nāgān na tārkṣyaṃ nāga-ghātinam ||Panc_1.460||
GK22vispancu:3141: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase |
GK22vispancu:3143: evaṃ tena sambodhitaḥ piṅgalakaḥ sañjīvaka-śokaṃ tyaktvā
GK22vispancu:3148: athedam ārabhyate mitra-samprāptir nāma dvitīyaṃ tantram |
GK22vispancu:3155: asti dākṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṃ nāma nagaram |
GK22vispancu:3156: tasya nātidūrastho mahocchrāyavān nānā-vihaṅgopabhukta-phalaḥ kīṭair āvṛta-koṭaraś
GK22vispancu:3161: viśrabdhaṃ madhupair nipīta-kusumaḥ ślāghyaḥ sa eva drumaḥ sarvāṅgair bahu-sattva-saṅga-sukhado bhū-bhāra-bhūto 'paraḥ ||Panc_2.2||
GK22vispancu:3162: tatra ca laghupatanako nāma vāyasaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:3163: sa kadācit prāṇa-yātrārthaṃ puram uddiśya pracalito yāvat paśyati, tāvaj jāla-hasto
GK22vispancu:3164: 'tikṛṣṇa-tanuḥ sphuṭita-caraṇa ūrdhva-keśo yama-kiṅkarākāro naraḥ saṃmukho babhūva |
GK22vispancu:3165: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkita-manā vyacintayat-yad ayaṃ durātmādya mamāśraya-vaṭa-pādapa-sammukho 'bhyeti |
GK22vispancu:3166: tan na jñāyate kim adya vaṭa-vāsināṃ vihaṅgamānāṃ saṅkṣayo bhaviṣyati na vā |
GK22vispancu:3167: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vicintya tat-kṣaṇān nivṛtya tam eva baṭa-pādapaṃ gatvā sarvān vihaṅgamān provāca-bhoḥ ! ayaṃ durātmā lubdhako jāla-taṇḍula-hastaḥ
GK22vispancu:3171: te taṇḍulā bhavadbhiḥ sarvair api kālakūṭa-sadṛśā
GK22vispancu:3173: evaṃ vadatas tasya sa lubdhakas tatra baṭa-tala āgatya jālaṃ prasārya
GK22vispancu:3174: sindu-vāra-sadṛśāṃs taṇḍulān prakṣipya nātidūraṃ gatvā nibhṛtaḥ sthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:3175: atha ye pakṣiṇas tatra sthitās te laghu-patanaka-vākyārgalayā nivāritās tāṃs taṇḍulān hālāhālāṅkurān iva vīkṣamāṇā nibhṛtās tasthuḥ |
GK22vispancu:3177: prāṇa-yātrārtha-paribhramaṃs tāṃs taṇḍulān dūrato 'pi paśyan laghupatanakena nivāryamāṇo 'pi jihvā-laulyād bhakṣaṇārtham apatat |
GK22vispancu:3186: paulastyaḥ katham anya-dāra-haraṇe doṣaṃ na vijñātavān
GK22vispancu:3188: akṣaiś cāpi yudhiṣṭhireṇa sahasā prāpto hy anarthaḥ kathaṃ pratyāsanna-vipatti-mūḍha-manasāṃ prāyo matiḥ kṣīyate ||Panc_2.4||
GK22vispancu:3192: atrāntare lubdhakas tān baddhān vijñāya prahṛṣṭa-manāḥ prodyata-yaṣṭis

GK22vispancu:3322: tac chrutvā viśeṣād antarlīno hiraṇyaka āha-bhoḥ ! drutaṃ gamyatām asmāt

GK22vispancu:3325: tat kiṃ na kriyate mayā saha darśanam ?
