GK22vispancu:5215: athaikasmin divase kṣīra-nayanāya putraṃ nirūpya brāhmaṇo grāmāntaraṃ jagāma |
GK22vispancu:5216: putro 'pi kṣīraṃ tatra nītvā saṃsthāpya ca punar gṛhaṃ samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5217: dināntare tatra gatvā dīnārakaṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhītvā ca cintitavān-nūnaṃ
GK22vispancu:5220: grahīṣyāmi ity evaṃ sampradhāryānyedyuḥ kṣīraṃ dadatā brāhmaṇa-putreṇa
GK22vispancu:5222: tataḥ katham api daiva-vaśād amukta-jīvit eva roṣāt tam eva tīvra-viṣada-śanais tathādaśat, yathā sadyaḥ pañcatvam
GK22vispancu:5224: svajanaiś ca nātidūre kṣetrasya kāṣṭha-sañcayaiḥ saṃskṛtaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5229: bhūtān yo nānugṛhṇāti hy ātmanaḥ śaraṇāgatān |
GK22vispancu:5230: bhūtārthās tasya naśyanti haṃsāḥ padma-vane yathā ||Panc_3.133||
GK22vispancu:5235: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne citraratho nāma rājā |
GK22vispancu:5236: tasya yodhaiḥ surakṣyamāṇaṃ padmasaro nāma saras tiṣṭhati tatra ca prabhūtā jāmbūnada-mayā haṃsās tiṣṭhanti |
GK22vispancu:5238: atha tatra sarasi sauvarṇo bṛhat-pakṣī samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5246: ete pakṣiṇa evaṃ vadanti, yad asmākaṃ rājā kiṃ kariṣyati ? na kasyāpy āvāsaṃ dadmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5250: tato rājā bhṛtyān abravīt-bho bhoḥ gacchata |
GK22vispancu:5251: sarvān pakṣiṇo gatāsūn kṛtvā śīghram ānayata |
GK22vispancu:5253: atha laguḍa-hastān rāja-puruṣān dṛṣṭvā tatraikena pakṣiṇā
GK22vispancu:5258: ity uktvā punar api brāhmaṇaḥ pratyūṣe kṣīraṃ gṛhītvā tatra gatvā
GK22vispancu:5260: tadā sarpaś ciraṃ valmīka-dvārāntar-līna eva brāhmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca-tvaṃ lobhād atrāgataḥ putra-śokam api vihāya |
GK22vispancu:5261: ataḥ paraṃ tava mama ca prītir nocitā |
GK22vispancu:5262: tava putreṇa yauvanonmādenāhaṃ tāḍito mayā sa dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5264: tvayā ca putra-śoka-duḥkhaṃ kathaṃ vismartavyam iti punar uktvā vivarāntar-gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5265: brāhmaṇaś ca maṇiṃ gṛhītvā putra-buddhiṃ nindan sva-gṛham āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5268: tad asmin hate'yatnād eva rājyam akaṇṭakaṃ bhavato bhavati |
GK22vispancu:5269: tasyaitad-vacanaṃ śrutvā krūrākṣaṃ papraccha-bhadra ! tvaṃ tu kiṃ manyase
GK22vispancu:5271: yat kāraṇaṃ śaraṇāgato na vadhyate suṣṭhu |
GK22vispancu:5273: śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5274: pūjitaś ca yathā-nyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ ||Panc_3.134||
GK22vispancu:5281: naiva kaścit suhṛt tasya na sambandhī na bāndhavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5282: sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parityaktas tena raudreṇa karmaṇā ||Panc_3.136||
GK22vispancu:5285: udvejanīyā bhūtānāṃ vyālā iva bhavanti te ||Panc_3.137||
GK22vispancu:5286: sa pañjarakam ādāya pāśaṃ ca laguḍaṃ tathā |
GK22vispancu:5288: anyedyur bhramatas tasya vane kāpi kapotikā |
GK22vispancu:5289: jātā hasta-gatā tāṃ sa prākṣipat pañjcarāntare ||Panc_3.139||
GK22vispancu:5290: atha kṛṣṇā diśaḥ sarvā vanasthasyābhavan ghanaiḥ
GK22vispancu:5292: tataḥ sa trasta-hṛdayaḥ kampamāno muhur muhuḥ |
GK22vispancu:5295: prāpya vṛkṣaṃ vadaty evaṃ yo 'tra tiṣṭhati kaścana ||Panc_3.142||
GK22vispancu:5296: tasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptaḥ sa paritrātu mām iti |
GK22vispancu:5298: atha tasya taroḥ skandhe kapotaḥ suciroṣitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5300: vāta-varṣo mahān āsīn na cāgacchati me priyā |
GK22vispancu:5301: tayā virahitaṃ hy etac chūnyam adya gṛhaṃ mama ||Panc_3.145||
GK22vispancu:5303: yasya syād īdṛśī bhāryā dhanyaḥ sa puruṣo bhuvi ||Panc_3.146||
GK22vispancu:5304: na gṛhaṃ gṛham ity āhur gṛhiṇī gṛham ucyate |
GK22vispancu:5306: pañjara-sthā tataḥ śrutvā bhartur duḥkhānvitaṃ vacaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5307: kapotikā susantuṣṭā vākyaṃ cedam athāha sā ||Panc_3.148||
GK22vispancu:5308: na sā strīty abhimantavyā yasyāṃ bhartā na tuṣyati |
GK22vispancu:5309: tuṣṭe bhartari nārīṇāṃ tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarva-devatāḥ ||Panc_3.149||
GK22vispancu:5311: bhasmībhavatu sā nārī yasyāṃ bhartā na tuṣyati ||Panc_3.150||
GK22vispancu:5312: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ bhrātā mitaṃ sutaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5313: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet ||Panc_3.151||
GK22vispancu:5315: śṛṇuṣvāvahitaḥ kānta yat te vakṣyāmy ahaṃ hitam |
GK22vispancu:5316: prāṇair api tvayā nityaṃ saṃrakṣyaḥ śaraṇāgataḥ ||Panc_3.152||
GK22vispancu:5318: śītārtaś ca kṣudhārtaś ca pūjām asmai samācara ||Panc_3.153||
GK22vispancu:5320: yaḥ sāyam atithiṃ prāptaṃ yathā-śakti na pūjayet |
GK22vispancu:5322: mā cāsmai tvaṃ kṛthā dvaiṣaṃ baddhāneneti mat-priyā |
GK22vispancu:5330: bhadra susvāgataṃ te'stu brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te |
GK22vispancu:5331: santāpaś ca na kartavyaḥ sva-gṛhe vartate bhavān ||Panc_3.159||
GK22vispancu:5333: kapota khalu śītaṃ me hima-trāṇaṃ vidhīyatām ||Panc_3.160||
GK22vispancu:5335: tataḥ śuṣkeṣu parṇeṣu tam āśu samadīpayat ||Panc_3.161||
GK22vispancu:5336: susandīptaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tam āha śaraṇāgatam |
GK22vispancu:5338: udgatena ca jīvāmo vayaṃ sarve vanaukasaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5339: na cāsti vibhavaḥ kaścin nāśaye yena te kṣudham ||Panc_3.163||
GK22vispancu:5342: ekasyāpy atither annaṃ yaḥ pradātuṃ na śaktimān |
GK22vispancu:5344: tat tathā sādhayāmy etac charīraṃ duḥkha-jīvitam |
GK22vispancu:5345: yathā bhūyo na vakṣyāmi nāstīty arthi-samāgame ||Panc_3.166||
GK22vispancu:5346: sa ninindi kilātmānaṃ na tu taṃ lubdhakaṃ punaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5350: tatas taṃ lubdhako dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā pīḍito bhṛśam |
GK22vispancu:5351: kapotam agnau patitaṃ vākyam etad abhāṣata ||Panc_3.169||
GK22vispancu:5352: yaḥ karoti naraḥ pāpaṃ na tasyātmā dhruvaṃ priyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5353: ātmanā hi kṛtaṃ pāpam ātmanaiva hi bhujyate ||Panc_3.170||
GK22vispancu:5359: toyaṃ svalpaṃ yathā grīṣmaḥ śoṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ ||Panc_3.173||
GK22vispancu:5361: upavāsair bahuvidhaiś cariṣye dharmam uttamam ||Panc_3.174|| tato yaṣṭiṃ śalākāṃ ca jālakaṃ pañjaraṃ tathā |
GK22vispancu:5362: babhañja lubdhako dīnāṃ kāpotīṃ ca mumoca tām ||Panc_3.175||
GK22vispancu:5363: lubdhakena tato muktā dṛṣṭvāgnau patitaṃ patim |
GK22vispancu:5365: na kāryam adya me nātha jīvitena tvayā vinā |
GK22vispancu:5366: dīnāyāḥ pati-hīnāyāḥ kiṃ nāryā jīvite phalam ||Panc_3.177||
GK22vispancu:5367: māno darpas tv ahaṅkāraḥ kulaṃ pūjā ca bandhuṣu |
GK22vispancu:5370: pativratā susandīptaṃ tam evāgniṃ viveśa sā ||Panc_3.179||
GK22vispancu:5372: bhartāraṃ sā vimānasthaṃ dadarśa svaṃ kapotikā ||Panc_3.180||
GK22vispancu:5373: so 'pi divya-tanur bhūtvā yathārtham idam abravīt |
GK22vispancu:5374: aho mām anugacchantyā kṛtaṃ sādhu śubhe tvayā ||Panc_3.181||
GK22vispancu:5375: tisraḥ koṭyo 'rdha-koṭī ca yāni romāṇi mānuṣe |
GK22vispancu:5376: tāvat kālaṃ vaset svarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati ||Panc_3.182||
GK22vispancu:5379: harṣāviṣṭas tato vyādho viveśa ca vanaṃ dhanam |
GK22vispancu:5383: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-śrūyate hi kapotena (134) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:5384: tac chrutvārimardano dīptākṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān-evam avasthite kiṃ bhavān manyate
GK22vispancu:5388: priya-kāraka bhadraṃ te yan mamāsti harasva tat ||Panc_3.186||
GK22vispancu:5390: hartavyaṃ te na paśyāmi hartavyaṃ ced bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:5392: arimardanaḥ pṛṣṭavān-kā ca nāvagūhate ? kaś cāyaṃ cauraḥ ? iti vistarataḥ śrotum icchāmi
GK22vispancu:5396: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kāmāturo nāma vṛddha-vaṇik |
GK22vispancu:5397: tena ca kāmopahṛta-cetasā, mṛta-bhāryeṇa kācin nirdhana-vaṇik-sutā, prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattvodvāhitā
GK22vispancu:5398: atha sā duḥkhābhibhūtā taṃ vṛddha-vaṇijaṃ draṣṭum api na śaśāka |
GK22vispancu:5400: śvetaṃ padaṃ śirasi yat tu śiroruhāṇāṃ sthānaṃ paraṃ paribhavasya tad eva puṃsām |
GK22vispancu:5401: āropitāsthi-śakalaṃ parihṛtya yānti cāṇḍāla-kūpam iva dūrataraṃ taruṇyaḥ ||Panc_3.188||
GK22vispancu:5403: gātraṃ saṅkucitaṃ gatir vigalitā dantāś ca nāśaṅgatā dṛṣṭir bhrāmyati rūpam apy upahataṃ vaktraṃ ca lālāyate |
GK22vispancu:5404: vākyaṃ naiva karoti bāndhava-janaḥ patnī na śuśrūṣate
GK22vispancu:5406: atha kadācit sā tena sahaikaśayane parāṅmukhī yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvad gṛhe cauraḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5407: sāpi taṃ cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaya-vyākulitā vṛddham api taṃ
GK22vispancu:5410: cintayāmāsa-aho kim eṣā mām adyāvagūhate ? yāvan nipuṇatayā paśyati tāvat
GK22vispancu:5411: gṛha-koṇaika-deśe cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā vyacintayat-nūnam eṣāsya bhayān mām
GK22vispancu:5412: āliṅgati iti jñātvā taṃ cauram āha-yā mamodvijate (186) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:5413: tac chrutvā cauro 'py āha-hartavyaṃ te na paśyāmi (187) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:5414: tasmāc caurasyāpy upakāraḥ śreyaś cintyate kiṃ punaḥ śaraṇāgatasya |
GK22vispancu:5415: api cāyaṃ tair viprakṛto 'smākam eva puṣṭaye bhaviṣyati tadīya-randhra-darśanāya
GK22vispancu:5418: sāmpratam evaṃ sthite kiṃ karaṇīyam iti ?
GK22vispancu:5422: caureṇa jīvitaṃ dattaṃ rākṣasena tu go-yugam ||Panc_3.190||
GK22vispancu:5427: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne daridro droṇa-nāmā brāhmaṇaḥ, pratigraha-dhanaḥ
GK22vispancu:5431: pariśoṣita-śarīraḥ, tasya ca kenāpi yajamānenānukampayā śiśu-go-yugaṃ
GK22vispancu:5435: tac ca dṛṣṭvā sahasaiva kaścic cauraś
GK22vispancu:5436: cintitavān-aham asya brāhmaṇasya go-yugam idam apahariṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5437: iti niścitya niśāyāṃ bandhana-pāśaṃ gṛhītvā, yāvat prasthitas tāvad ardha-mārge
GK22vispancu:5443: so 'bravīt-ahaṃ krūra-karmā cauro daridra-brāhmaṇasya go-yugaṃ hartuṃ prasthito 'smi |
GK22vispancu:5445: atas tam eva brāhmaṇam adya bhakṣayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5446: atha tau tatra gatvaikānte kānlam anveṣayantau sthitau |
GK22vispancu:5447: prasupte ca brāhmaṇe tad-bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prasthitaṃ rākṣasaṃ dṛṣṭvā cauro 'bravīt-bhadra
GK22vispancu:5448: ! naiṣanyāyo yato go-yuge mayāpahṛte paścāt tvam enaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhakṣaya |
GK22vispancu:5449: so 'bravīt-kadācid ayaṃ brāhmaṇo go-śabdena budhyeta tadānarthako 'yaṃ
GK22vispancu:5451: cauro 'py abravīt-tavāpi yadi bhakṣaṇāyopasthitasya eko 'py antarāyaḥ syāt |
GK22vispancu:5452: tadāham api na śaknomi go-yugam apahartum |
GK22vispancu:5455: itthaṃ cāham ahamikayā tayor vivadatoḥ samutpanne dvaidhe pratirava-vaśād brāhmaṇo jajāgāra
GK22vispancu:5456: atha taṃ cauro 'bravīt-brāhmaṇa ! tvām evāyaṃ rākṣaso bhakṣayitum icchati iti |
GK22vispancu:5457: rākṣaso 'py āha-brāhmaṇa ! cauro 'yaṃ go-yugaṃ te'pahartum icchati |
GK22vispancu:5462: atha tasya vacanam avadhāryārimardanaḥ punar api prākārakarṇam
GK22vispancu:5464: so 'bravīt-deva ! avadhya evāyam, yato rakṣitenānena kadācit
GK22vispancu:5467: parasparasya marmāṇi ye na rakṣanti jantavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5473: asti kasmiṃścin nagare devaśaktir nāma rājā |
GK22vispancu:5480: kasmiṃścin nagare bhikṣāṭanaṃ kṛtvā mahati devālaye kālaṃ yāpayati |
GK22vispancu:5481: atha tatra nagare balir nāma rājāste |
GK22vispancu:5484: te ca pratidivasam ādityodaye pituḥ pādāntikam āgatya namaskāraṃ cakratuḥ |
GK22vispancu:5485: tatra caikābravīt-vijayasva mahārāja ! yasya prasādāt sarvaṃ sukhaṃ labhyate |
GK22vispancu:5486: dvitīyā tu-vihitaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārāja ! iti bravīti |
GK22vispancu:5487: tac chrutvā prakupito rājābravīt-bho mantriṇaḥ ! enāṃ duṣṭa-bhāṣiṇīṃ
GK22vispancu:5488: kumārikāṃ kasyacid vaideśikasya prayacchata tena nija-vihitam iyam eva bhuṅkte |
GK22vispancu:5489: atha tatheti pratipadyālpa-parivārā sā kumārikā mantribhis tasya
GK22vispancu:5491: sāpi prahṛṣṭa-manasā taṃ patiṃ devavat pratipadyādāya cānya-viṣayaṃ gatā |
GK22vispancu:5495: kṛtvā ca kraya-vikrayaṃ yāvad āgacchati tāvat sa rāja-putro valmīkopari kṛta-mūrdhā
GK22vispancu:5497: tasya ca mukhād bhujagaḥ phaṇāṃ niṣkāsya vāyum aśnāti |
GK22vispancu:5498: tatraiva ca valmīke'paraḥ sarpo niṣkramya tathaivāsīt |
GK22vispancu:5499: atha tayoḥ paraspara-darśanena krodha-saṃrakta-locanayor madhyād valmīkasthena sarpeṇoktam-bho bho durātman ! kathaṃ sundara-sarvāṅgaṃ
GK22vispancu:5501: mukhastho 'rir abravīt-bho bhoḥ ! tvayāpi durātmanāsya valmīkasya madhye katham idaṃ dūṣitaṃ hāṭaka-pūrṇaṃ kalaśa-yugalam ity evaṃ parasparasya
GK22vispancu:5503: punar valmīkastho 'hir abravīt-bho durātman ! bheṣajam idaṃ te kiṃ ko 'pi
GK22vispancu:5504: na jānāti yaj jīrṇotkālita-kāñjikā-rājikā-pānena bhavān vināśam upayāti |
GK22vispancu:5505: athodarastho 'hir abravīt-tavāpy etad bheṣajaṃ kiṃ kaścid api na vetti yad uṣṇa-tailena mahoṣṇodakena vā tava vināśaḥ syād iti |
GK22vispancu:5507: rāja-kanyā viṭapāntaritā tayoḥ parasparālāpān marma-mayān ākarṇya tathaivānuṣṭhitavatī |
GK22vispancu:5508: vidhāya vyaṅgaṃ nīrogaṃ bhartāraṃ nidhiṃ ca paramam āsādya svadeśābhimukhaṃ prāyāt |
GK22vispancu:5511: tac ca śrutvā svayam arirdano 'py evaṃ samarthitavān |
GK22vispancu:5517: apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāṃ tu vimānanā |
GK22vispancu:5518: trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam ||Panc_3.192||
GK22vispancu:5520: pratyakṣe'pi kṛte pāpe mūrkhaḥ sāmnā praśāmyati |
GK22vispancu:5526: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vīravaro nāma rathakāraḥ |
GK22vispancu:5529: so 'pi tasyāḥ parīkṣaṇārthaṃ vyacintayat-atha mayāsyāḥ parīkṣaṇaṃ kartavyam |
GK22vispancu:5531: yadi syāt pāvakaḥ śītaḥ proṣṇī vā śaśa-lāñchanaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5532: strīṇāṃ tadā satītvaṃ syād yadi syād durjano hitaḥ ||Panc_3.194||
GK22vispancu:5535: yac ca vedeṣu śāstreṣu na dṛṣṭaṃ na ca saṃśrutam |
GK22vispancu:5536: tat sarvaṃ vetti loko 'yaṃ yat syād brahmāṇḍa-madhyagam ||Panc_3.195||
GK22vispancu:5537: evaṃ sampradhārya bhāryām avocat-priye ! prabhāte'haṃ grāmāntaraṃ yāsyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5539: tat tvayā kim api pātheyaṃ mama yogyaṃ vidheyam |
GK22vispancu:5541: autsukyāt sarva-kāryāṇi santyajya siddham annaṃ ghṛta-śarkarā-prāyam akarot |
GK22vispancu:5545: athāsau pratyūṣe utthāya sva-gṛhān nirgataḥ sāpi taṃ prasthitaṃ vijñāya prahasita-vadanāṅga-saṃskāraṃ kurvāṇā kathañcit taṃ divasam atyavāhayat |

GK22vispancu:5569: tad asti kaścid upāyo yena me patiḥ

GK22vispancu:5576: tad yat kiñcit kartu-manās tat kuruṣva |
GK22vispancu:5577: na hi devatā-vacanam anyathā bhaviṣyatīti niścayaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5579: so 'pi rathakāro mūrkhas tasyās tad-vacanam ākarṇya pulakāñcita-tanuḥ
GK22vispancu:5580: śayyādhastalān niṣkramya tām uvāca-sādhu pativrate ! sādhu kula-nandini !
GK22vispancu:5584: tvaṃ sva-bhartṛ-bhaktānāṃ mukhyā nārīṇāṃ, yad evaṃ brahma-vrataṃ
GK22vispancu:5586: yad āyur buddhi-kṛte'pamṛtyu-vināśārthaṃ catvam evaṃ kṛtavatī |

GK22vispancu:5594: tataś ca nṛtyaṃ kṛtvā-he brahma-vrata-dharāṇāṃ dhurīṇa ! tvayāpi mayy upakṛtam ity ādy uktvā skandhād uttārya yatra yatra svajana-gṛha-dvārādiṣu
GK22vispancu:5595: babhrāma tatra tatra tayor ubhayor api tad-guṇa-varṇanam akarot |
GK22vispancu:5597: tat sarvathā mūlotkhātā vayaṃ vinaṣṭāḥ smaḥ |

GK22vispancu:5627: ukto, yad-bho mune ! na yuktam anuṣṭhitaṃ bhavatā yad ahaṃ pāṣāṇena tāḍitaḥ |

GK22vispancu:5831: kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe kharanakharo nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:5832: sa kadācid itaś cetaś ca paribhraman kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭho na kiñcid api sattvam āsasāda |
GK22vispancu:5833: tataś cāstam anasamaye mahatīṃ giri-guhām āsādya praviṣṭaś cintayāmāsa-nūnam etasyāṃ guhāyāṃ rātrau kenāpi sattvenāgantavyam |
GK22vispancu:5835: etasminn antare tat-svāmī dadhipuccho nāma śṛgālaḥ samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5836: sa ca yāvat paśyati tāvat siṃha-pada-paddhatir guhāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ, na ca niṣkrāntā iti dṛṣṭavān
GK22vispancu:5837: tataś cācintayat-aho vinaṣṭo 'smi, nūnam asyāntargatena siṃhena
GK22vispancu:5839: tat kiṃ karomi ? kathaṃ jñāsyāmi ? evaṃ vicintya dvārasthaḥ
GK22vispancu:5840: phūtkartum ārabdhaḥ-aho bila ! aho bila ! ity uktvā tūṣṇīṃbhūya bhūyo 'pi
GK22vispancu:5841: tathaiva pratyabhāṣata-bhoḥ ! kiṃ na smarasi yan mayā tvayā saha samayaḥ kṛto 'sti ? yan mayā bāhyāt samāgatena tvaṃ vaktavyaḥ, tvayā cāham ākaraṇīyaḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:5842: tad yadi māṃ nāhvayasi tato 'haṃ dvitīyaṃ bilaṃ yāsyāmi |
GK22vispancu:5843: atha tac chrutvā siṃhaś cintitavān-nūnam eṣā guhāsya samāgatasya sadā samāhvānaṃ karoti |
GK22vispancu:5844: param adya mad-bhayān na kiṃcid brūte |
GK22vispancu:5847: pravartante na vāṇī ca vepathuś cādhiko bhavet ||Panc_3.218||
GK22vispancu:5848: tad aham asyāhvānaṃ karomi yena tad-anusāreṇa praviṣṭo 'yaṃ me bhojyatāṃ yāsyati |
GK22vispancu:5851: sā guhā pratirava-sampūrṇā anyān api dūra-sthān araṇya-jīvāṃs trāsayāmāsa
GK22vispancu:5852: | śṛgālo 'pi palāyamāna imaṃ ślokam apaṭhat-anāgataṃ yaḥ kurute sa śobhate ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:5853: tad evaṃ matvā yuṣmābhir mayā saha gantavyam iti |
GK22vispancu:5856: atha raktākṣe gate sthirajīvy atihṛṣṭa-manā vyacintayat-aho ! kalyāṇam asmākam upasthitam, yad raktāṃśo gataḥ sa dīrghadarśī ete ca mūḍha-manasaḥ
GK22vispancu:5859: na dīrgha-darśino yasya mantriṇaḥ syur mahīpateḥ |
GK22vispancu:5860: kramāyātā dhruvaṃ tasya na cirāt syāt parikṣayaḥ ||Panc_3.219||
GK22vispancu:5862: mantri-rūpā hi ripavaḥ sambhāvyās te vicakṣaṇaiḥ |
GK22vispancu:5863: ye santaṃ nayam utsṛjya sevante pratilomataḥ ||Panc_3.220||
GK22vispancu:5864: evaṃ vicintya sva-kulāya ekaikāṃ vana-kāṣṭhikāṃ guhā-pradīpanārthaṃ dine dine prakṣipati |
GK22vispancu:5865: na ca te mūrkhā ulūkā vijānanti, yad eṣa kulāyam
GK22vispancu:5868: amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti ca |
GK22vispancu:5869: śubhaṃ vetty aśubhaṃ pāpaṃ bhadraṃ daiva-hato naraḥ ||Panc_3.221||
GK22vispancu:5870: atha kulāya-vyājena durga-dvāre kṛte kāṣṭha-nicaye, sañjāte sūryodaye,
GK22vispancu:5871: andhatāṃ prāpteṣūlūkeṣu satsu sthirajīvī śīghram ṛṣyamūkaṃ gatvā meghavarṇam āha-svāmin ! dāha-sādhyā kṛtā ripu-guhāḥ |
GK22vispancu:5872: tat saparivāraḥ sametyaikaikā vana-kāṣṭhikāṃ jvalantī gṛhītvā guhā-dvāre'smat-kulāye
GK22vispancu:5873: prakṣipa yena sarve śatravaḥ kumbhīpāka-naraka-prāyeṇa duḥkhena mriyante |
GK22vispancu:5874: tac chrutvā prahṛṣṭo meghavarṇa āha-tāta ! kathayātma-vṛttāntam |
GK22vispancu:5877: yataḥ kadācit tasya ripo kaścit praṇidhir mamehāgamanaṃ nivedayiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:5883: tat kṛtyaṃ devatās tasya kopād vighnanty asaṃśayam ||Panc_3.222||
GK22vispancu:5885: yasya yasya hi kāryasya phalitasya viśeṣataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5887: tad-guhāyām āyātasya te hata-śatroḥ sarvaṃ savistaraṃ nirvyākulatayā
GK22vispancu:5888: kathayiṣyāmi athāsau tad-vacanam ākarṇya sa-parijana ekaikāṃ jvalantīṃ vana-kāṣṭhikāṃ cañcv-agreṇa gṛhītvā tad-guhā-dvāraṃ prāpya
GK22vispancu:5891: smaranto dvārasyāvṛtatvād aniḥsaranto guhā-madhye kumbhīpāka-nyāyam āpannā mṛtāś ca |
GK22vispancu:5892: evaṃ śatrūn niḥśeṣatāṃ nītvā bhūyo 'pi meghavarṇas tad eva
GK22vispancu:5895: pramudita-manāḥ sthirajīvinam apṛcchat-tāta ! kathaṃ tvayā śatru-madhye
GK22vispancu:5896: gatena etāvat-paryantaṃ kālo nītaḥ ? tad atra kautukam asmākaṃ vartate,
GK22vispancu:5901: tad ākarṇya sthirajīvy āha-bhadra ! āgāmi-phala-vāñchayā kaṣṭam api sevako
GK22vispancu:5905: sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ yatra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ||Panc_3.225||
GK22vispancu:5906: upanata-bhaye yo yo mārgo hitārtha-karo bhavet- sa sa nipuṇayā buddhyā sevyo mahān kṛpaṇo 'pi vā |
GK22vispancu:5907: karikara-nibhau jyāghātā kau mahāstra-viśāradau valaya-racitau strīvad bāhū kṛtau na kirīṭinā
GK22vispancu:5908: śaktenāpi satā janena viduṣā kālāntarāpekṣiṇā vastavyaṃ khalu vākya-vajra-viṣame kṣudre'pi pāpe jane |
GK22vispancu:5909: darvī-vyagra-kareṇa dhūma-malinenāyāsa-yukte ca bhīmenātibalena matsya-bhavane kiṃ noṣitaṃ sūdavat ||Panc_3.227||
GK22vispancu:5910: yad vā tad vā viṣama-patitaḥ sādhu vā garhitaṃ vā kālāpekṣī hṛdaya-nihitaṃ buddhimān karma kuryāt |
GK22vispancu:5913: siddhiṃ prārthayatā janena viduṣā tejo nigṛhya svakaṃ sattvotsāhavatāpi daiva-vidhiṣu sthairyaṃ prakārya kramāt |
GK22vispancu:5915: kiṃ kliṣṭaḥ suciraṃ virāṭa-bhavane śrīmān na dharmātmajaḥ ||Panc_3.229||
GK22vispancu:5919: kāntyā śrīr iva yātra sāpi vidaśāṃ kāla-kramād āgatā |
GK22vispancu:5921: draupadyā nanu matsya-rāja-bhavane dhṛṣṭaṃ na kiṃ candanam ||Panc_3.231||
GK22vispancu:5922: meghavarṇa āha-tāta ! asi-dhārā-vratam idaṃ manye yad ariṇā saha saṃvāsaḥ
GK22vispancu:5924: paraṃ na tādṛṅ-mūrkha-samāgamaḥ kvāpi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5925: na ca mahāprajñam aneka-śāstreṣv apratima-buddhiṃ raktākṣaṃ vinā dhīmān |
GK22vispancu:5926: yat-kāraṇaṃ tena madīyaṃ yathāvasthitaṃ cittaṃ jñātam |
GK22vispancu:5927: ye punar anye mantriṇas te mahā-mūrkhā mantri-mātra-vyapadeśopajīvino
GK22vispancu:5935: ātmānam ādṛto rakṣet pramādād dhi vinaśyati ||Panc_3.234||
GK22vispancu:5937: santāpayanti kam apathya-bhujaṃ na rogā durmantriṇaṃ kam upayānti na nīti-doṣāḥ |
GK22vispancu:5938: kaṃ śrīr na darpayati kaṃ na nihanti mṛtyuḥ kaṃ svīkṛtā na viṣayā paripīḍayanti ||Panc_3.235||
GK22vispancu:5939: lubdhasya naśyati yaśaḥ piśunasya maitrī naṣṭa-kriyasya kula artha-parasya dharmaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5942: tad rājan ! asi-dhārā-vrataṃ mayācaritam aritam ari-saṃsargād iti yad bhavatoktaṃ, tan mayā sākṣād evānubhūtam |
GK22vispancu:5944: apamānaṃ puraskṛtya mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ |
GK22vispancu:5945: svārtham abhyuddharet prājñaḥ kārya-dhvaṃso hi mūrkhatā ||Panc_3.237||
GK22vispancu:5946: skandhenāpi vahec chatruṃ kālam āsādya buddhimān |
GK22vispancu:5952: asti varuṇādri-samīpa ekasmin pradeśe pariṇata-vayā manda-viṣo nāma
GK22vispancu:5954: sa evaṃ citte sañcintitavān-kathaṃ nāma mayā sukhopāya-vṛttyā vartitavyam iti |
GK22vispancu:5955: tato bahu-maṇḍūkaṃ hradam upagamya dhṛti-parītam ivātmānaṃ darśitavān |
GK22vispancu:5956: atha tathā sthite saudaka-prānta-gatenaikena maṇḍūkena pṛṣṭaḥ-māma ! kim adya yathā-pūrvam āhārārthaṃ na viharasi |
GK22vispancu:5957: so 'bravīt-bhadra ! kuto me manda-bhāgyasyāhārābhilāṣaḥ ? yat kāraṇam adya
GK22vispancu:5958: rātrau pradoṣa eva mayāhārārthaṃ viharamāṇena dṛṣṭa eko maṇḍūkaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5961: svādhyāya-prasaktānāṃ brāhmaṇānām antaram apakrānto na vibhāvito mayā
GK22vispancu:5966: atha tasya pitrā duḥkhitenāhaṃ śapto yathā-durātman ! tvayā niraparādho mat-suto daṣṭaḥ
GK22vispancu:5967: tad anena doṣeṇa tvaṃ maṇḍūkānāṃ vāhanaṃ bhaviṣyasi,
GK22vispancu:5972: sarvair eva gatvā jala-pāda-nāmno dardura-rājasya vijñaptam |
GK22vispancu:5973: athāsāv api mantri-parivṛto 'tyadbhutam idam iti manyamāno sa-sambhramaṃ hradād uttīrya manda-viṣasya phaṇinaḥ phaṇā-pradeśam adhirūḍhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:5981: na tathā kariṇā yānaṃ turageṇa rathena vā |
GK22vispancu:5982: nara-yānena vā yānaṃ yathā mandaviṣeṇa me ||Panc_3.239||
GK22vispancu:5983: athānyedyur manda-viṣaś chadmanā mandaṃ mandaṃ visarpati |
GK22vispancu:5984: tac ca dṛṣṭvā jalapādo 'bravīt-bhadra ! mandaviṣa ! yathā-pūrvaṃ kim adya sādhu nohyate
GK22vispancu:5985: mandaviṣo 'bravīt-deva adyāhāra-vaikalyān na me voḍhuṃ śaktir asti |
GK22vispancu:5991: tato 'sau nairantaryeṇa maṇḍūkān bhakṣayan katipayair evāhobhir balavān
GK22vispancu:5995: kiyantaṃ kālam akṣīṇā bhaveyuḥ khāditā mama ||Panc_3.240||
GK22vispancu:5996: jala-pādo 'pi mandaviṣeṇa kṛta-kavaca-navyāmohita-cittaḥ kim api nāvabudhyate |
GK22vispancu:5997: atrāntare'nyo mahākāyaḥ kṛṣṇa-sarpas tam uddeśaṃ samāyātaḥ
GK22vispancu:5998: | taṃ ca maṇḍūkair vāhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismaya-gatam |
GK22vispancu:5999: āha ca-vayasya ! yad asmākam aśanaṃ taiḥ kathaṃ vāhyase |
GK22vispancu:6002: sarvam etad vijānāmi yathā vāhyo 'smi darduraiḥ |
GK22vispancu:6003: kiñcit kālaṃ pratīkṣe'haṃ ghṛtāndho brāhmaṇo yathā ||Panc_3.241||
GK22vispancu:6008: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne yajñadatto nāma brāhmaṇaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6009: tasya bhāryā puṃścaly anyāsakta-manā ajasraṃ viṭāyasa-khaṇḍa-ghṛtān ghṛta-pūrān kṛtvā bhartuś caurikayā prayacchati |
GK22vispancu:6011: kim etat paripacyate ? kutra vājasraṃ nayasīdam ? tat kathaya satyam |
GK22vispancu:6012: sā cotpanna-pratibhā kṛtaka-vacanair bhartāram abravīt-asty atra nātidūre bhagavatyā devyā āyatanam |
GK22vispancu:6015: atha tat paśyatā gṛhītvā tat sakalaṃ devyāyatanābhimukhī pratasthe |
GK22vispancu:6016: yat kāraṇaṃ devyā niveditenānena madīyo bhartaivaṃ maṃsyate yat mama brāhmaṇī bhagavatyāḥ kṛte nadyām avatīrya yāvat snānaṃ karoti tāvat tad bhartāpi mārgāntareṇāgatya devyāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'dṛśyo 'vatasthe |
GK22vispancu:6017: atha sā brāhmaṇī snātvā devy-āyatanam āgatya
GK22vispancu:6019: vyajijñapat-bhagavati ! kena prakāreṇa mama bhartāndho bhaviṣyati ?
GK22vispancu:6020: tac chrutvā svara-bhedena devī-pṛṣṭha-sthito brāhmaṇo jagāda-yadi tvam ajasraṃ ghṛta-pūrādi-bhakṣyaṃ tasmai bhartre prayacchasi, tataḥ śīghram andho bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:6021: sā tu bandhakī kṛtaka-vacana-vañcita-mānasā tasmai brāhmaṇāya tad eva nityaṃ pradadau |
GK22vispancu:6023: tac chrutvā cintitam anayā-devyāḥ prasādo 'yaṃ prāpta iti |
GK22vispancu:6024: atha tasyā hṛdaya-vallabho viṭas tat-sakāśam-andhībhūto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ kiṃ mama
GK22vispancu:6027: abhyāśa-gataṃ dṛṣṭvā keśair gṛhītvā laguḍa-pārṣṇi-prabhṛti-prahārais tāvad atāḍayat yāvad asau pañcatvam āpa |
GK22vispancu:6030: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-skandhenāpi vahec chatrum (238) ity ādi |
GK22vispancu:6031: atha rājan ! yathā mandaviṣeṇa buddhi-balena maṇḍūkā nihatās tathā mayāpi sarve vairiṇaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6033: vane prajvalito vahnir dahan mūlāni rakṣati |
GK22vispancu:6037: mahā-sattvā āpad-gatā api prārabdhaṃ na tyajanti |
GK22vispancu:6040: na muñcanti yad ārabdhaṃ kṛcchre'pi vyasanodaye ||Panc_3.243||
GK22vispancu:6042: prārabhyate na khalu vighna-bhayena nīcaiḥ prārabhya vighna-vihatā viramanti madhyāḥ |
GK22vispancu:6043: vighnaiḥ sahasra-guṇitair api hanyamānāḥ prārabdham uttama-guṇā na parityajanti ||Panc_3.244||
GK22vispancu:6044: tat kṛtaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ mama rājyaṃ śatrūn niḥśeṣatāṃ nayatā tvayā |
GK22vispancu:6047: ṛṇa-śeṣaṃ cāgni-śeṣaṃ ca śatru-śeṣaṃ tathaiva ca |
GK22vispancu:6048: vyādhi-śeṣaṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ kṛtvā prājño na sīdati ||Panc_3.245||
GK22vispancu:6049: so 'bravīt-deva ! bhāgyavān tvam evāsi, yasyārabdhaṃ sarvam eva
GK22vispancu:6051: tan na kevalaṃ śauryaṃ kṛtyaṃ sādhayati, kintu prajñayā yat
GK22vispancu:6054: śastrair hatā na hi hatā ripavo bhavanti
GK22vispancu:6056: śastaṃ nihanti puruṣasya śarīram ekaṃ prajñā kulaṃ ca vibhavaś ca yaśaś ca hanti ||Panc_3.246||
GK22vispancu:6060: prasarati matiḥ kāryārambhe dṛḍhībhavati smṛtiḥ svayam upanayann arthān mantro na gacchati viplavam |
GK22vispancu:6061: sphurati saphalas tarkaś cittaṃ samunnatim aśnute bhavati ca ratiḥ ślāghye kṛtye narasya bhaviṣyataḥ
GK22vispancu:6062: tathā ca naya-tyāga-śaurya-sampanne puruṣe rājyam iti |
GK22vispancu:6064: tyāgini śūre viduṣi ca saṃsarga-rucir jano guṇī bhavati |
GK22vispancu:6065: guṇavati dhanaṃ dhanāc chrīḥ śrīmaty ājñā tato rājyam ||Panc_3.248||
GK22vispancu:6071: uttuṅgāgraḥ sāra-bhūto vanānāṃ mānyābhyarcya cchidyate pādapendraḥ ||Panc_3.249||
GK22vispancu:6072: athavā svāmin ! kiṃ tenābhihitena ? yad anantara-jāle kriyā-rahitam
GK22vispancu:6077: phale visaṃvādam upāgatā giraḥ prayānti loke parihāsa-vastutām ||Panc_3.250||
GK22vispancu:6078: na ca laghuṣv api kartavyeṣu dhīmadbhir anādaraḥ kartavyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6084: tad adya jitārer mad-vibhor yathā-pūrvaṃ nidrā-lābho bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:6087: niḥsarpe baddha-sarpe vā bhavane suṣyate sukham |
GK22vispancu:6088: sadā dṛṣṭa-bhujaṅge tu nidrā duḥkhena labhyate ||Panc_3.252||
GK22vispancu:6098: prajā na rañjayed yas tu rājā rakṣādibhir guṇaiḥ |
GK22vispancu:6100: guṇeṣu rāgo vyasaneṣv anādaro ratiḥ subhṛtyeṣu ca yasya bhūpateḥ |
GK22vispancu:6103: na ca tvayā prāpta-rājyo 'ham iti matvā śrī-madenātmā vyasayitavyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6105: kāraṇam-calā hi rājño vibhūtayaḥ vaṃśārohaṇavad rājya-lakṣmī-durārohā,
GK22vispancu:6107: praśastārādhitāpy ante vipralambhinī, vānara-jātir iva vidrutāneka-cittā,
GK22vispancu:6109: anārya-saṅgatir ivāsthirā, āśīviṣa iva durupacārā, sandhyābhra-lekheva
GK22vispancu:6117: na ca kaścid anadhigamanīyo nāmāsty āpadām |
GK22vispancu:6119: rāmasya vrajanaṃ vane nivasanaṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutānāṃ vane vṛṣṇīnāṃ nidhanaṃ nalasya nṛpate rājyāt paribhraṃśanam |
GK22vispancu:6120: nāṭyācāryakam arjunasya patanaṃ sañcintya laṅkeśvare sarve kāla-vaśāj jano 'tra sahate kaḥ kaṃ paritrāyate ||Panc_3.257||
GK22vispancu:6121: kva sa daśarathaḥ svarge bhūtvā mahendra-suhṛd gataḥ kva sa jalanidher velāṃ baddhvā nṛpaḥ sagaras tathā |
GK22vispancu:6122: kva sa karatalāj jāto vainyaḥ kva sūrya-tanur manuḥ nanu balavatā kālenaite prabodhya nimīlitāḥ
GK22vispancu:6123: māndhātā kva gatas triloka-vijayī rājā kva satyavrataḥ
GK22vispancu:6124: devānāṃ nṛpatir gataḥ kva nahuṣaḥ sac-chāstravān keśavaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6125: manyante sarathāḥ sa-kuñjara-varāḥ śakrāsanādhyāsinaḥ kālenaiva mahātmanā tv anukṛtāḥ kālena nirvāsitāḥ ||Panc_3.259||
GK22vispancu:6127: sa ca nṛpatis te sacivās tāḥ pramadās tāni kānana-vanāni |
GK22vispancu:6128: sa ca te ca tāś ca tāni ca kṛtānta-dṛṣṭāni naṣṭāni ||Panc_3.260||
GK22vispancu:6135: athedam ārabhate labdha-praṇāśaṃ nāma caturthaṃ tantram |
GK22vispancu:6137: samutpanneṣu kāryeṣu buddhir yasya na hīyate |
GK22vispancu:6138: sa eva durgaṃ tarati jalastho vānaro yathā ||Panc_4.1||
GK22vispancu:6142: asti kasmiṃścit samudropakaṇṭhe mahān jambū-pādapaḥ sadā-phalaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6143: tatra ca raktamukho nāma vānaraḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:6144: tatra ca tasya taror adhaḥ kadācit karālamukho nāma makaraḥ samudra-salilān niṣkramya
GK22vispancu:6151: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyo mūrkho vā yadi paṇḍitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6153: na pṛcchec caraṇaṃ gotraṃ na ca vidyāṃ kulaṃ na ca |
GK22vispancu:6154: atithiṃ vaiśvadevānte śrāddhe ca manur abravīt ||Panc_4.3||
GK22vispancu:6156: atithiṃ pūjayed yas tu sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||Panc_4.4||
GK22vispancu:6158: gacchanti pitaras tasya vimukhāḥ saha daivataiḥ ||Panc_4.5||
GK22vispancu:6160: so 'pi tāni bhakṣayitvā tena saha ciraṃ goṣṭhī-sukham anubhūya bhūyo 'pi sva-bhavanam agāt
GK22vispancu:6161: evaṃ nityam eva tau vānara-makarau jambū-cchāyā-sthitau vividha-śāstra-goṣṭhyā kālaṃ nayantau sukhena tiṣṭhataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6166: sa āha-bhadre ! mamāsti parama-suhṛd raktamukho nāma vānaraḥ |
GK22vispancu:6181: ekaṃ prasūyate mātā dvitīyaṃ vāk prasūyate |
GK22vispancu:6182: vāg-jātam adhikaṃ procuḥ sodaryād api bāndhavāt ||Panc_4.6||
GK22vispancu:6183: atha makary āha-tvayā kadācid api mama vacanaṃ nānyathā kṛtam |
GK22vispancu:6184: tan nūnaṃ sā vānarī bhaviṣyati, yatas tasyā anurāgataḥ sakalam api dinaṃ tatra gamayasi |
GK22vispancu:6187: sāhlādaṃ vacanaṃ prayacchati na me no vāñchitaṃ kiñcana prāyaḥ procchvasiṣi drutaṃ hutavaha-jvālā samaṃ rātriṣu |
GK22vispancu:6188: kaṇṭhāśleṣa-parigrahe śithilatā yan nādarāc cumbase tat te dhūrta hṛdi sthitā priyatamā kācin mamevāparā ||Panc_4.7||
GK22vispancu:6189: so 'pi patnyāḥ pādopasaṅgrahaṃ kṛtvāṅkopari nidhāya tasyāḥ kopa-koṭim
GK22vispancu:6192: tvaṃ prāṇa-vallabhe kasmāt kopane kopam eṣyasi ||Panc_4.8||
GK22vispancu:6196: asmākam asti na kathañcid ihāvakāśaṃ tasmāt kṛtaṃ caraṇa-pāta-viḍambanābhiḥ ||Panc_4.9||
GK22vispancu:6197: aparaṃ sā yadi tava vallabhā na bhavati, tat kiṃ mayā bhaṇito 'pi tāṃ na vyāpādayasi |
GK22vispancu:6198: atha yadi sa vānaras tat kas tena saha tava snehaḥ ? tat kiṃ bahunā ? yadi tasya hṛdayaṃ na bhakṣayāmi, tan mayā prāyopaveśanaṃ kṛtaṃ viddhi |
GK22vispancu:6199: evaṃ tasyās tan niścayaṃ jñātvā cintā-vyākulita-hṛdayaḥ sa provāca-athavā
GK22vispancu:6202: eko grahas tu mīnānāṃ nīlī-madya-payos tathā ||Panc_4.10||
GK22vispancu:6203: tat kiṃ karomi ? kathaṃ sa me vadhyo bhavati |
GK22vispancu:6206: vānaro 'pi cirād āyāntaṃ taṃ sodvegam avalokya provāca-bho mitra
GK22vispancu:6207: ! kim adya cira-velāyāṃ samāyāto 'si ? kasmāt sāhlādaṃ nālapasi ? na subhāṣitāni paṭhasi |
GK22vispancu:6208: sa āha-mitra ! ahaṃ tava bhrātṛ-jāyayā niṣṭhuratarair vākyair abhihitaḥ-bhoḥ kṛtaghna ! mā me tvaṃ svamukhaṃ darśaya, yatas tvaṃ pratidinaṃ mitram upajīvasi |
GK22vispancu:6209: na ca tasya punaḥ pratyupakāraṃ gṛha-darśana-mātreṇāpi karoṣi |
GK22vispancu:6212: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca caure bhagna-vrate śaṭhe |
GK22vispancu:6213: niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ ||Panc_4.11||
GK22vispancu:6214: tat tvaṃ mama devaraṃ gṛhītvādya pratyupakārārthaṃ gṛham ānaya |
GK22vispancu:6215: no cet tvayā saha me para-loke darśanam iti |
GK22vispancu:6216: tad ahaṃ tayaivaṃ proktas tava sakāśam āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6217: tad adya tayā saha tvad-arthe kalahāyato mameyatī velā
GK22vispancu:6227: ātmanaḥ sammukhaṃ nityaṃ ya ākarṣati lolupaḥ ||Panc_4.12||
GK22vispancu:6231: paraṃ vayaṃ vanacarāḥ yuṣmadīyaṃ ca jalānte gṛham |
GK22vispancu:6233: tasmāt tām api me bhrātṛ-patnīm atrānaya yena praṇamya
GK22vispancu:6235: sa āha-bho mitra ! asti samudrāntare suramye pulina-pradeśe'smad-gṛham æ
GK22vispancu:6236: tan mama pṛṣṭham ārūdhaḥ sukhenākṛta-bhayo gaccha |
GK22vispancu:6237: so 'pi tac chrutvā sānandam āha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tat kiṃ vilambyate |
GK22vispancu:6240: tathānuṣṭhite'gādhe jaladhau gacchantaṃ marakam ālokya bhaya-trasta-manā
GK22vispancu:6243: tad ākarṇya makaraś cintayāmāsa-asāv agādhaṃ jalaṃ prāpto me vaśaḥ sañjātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6244: mat-pṛṣṭha-gatas tila-mātram api calituṃ na śaknoti |
GK22vispancu:6245: tasmāt kathayāmy asya nijābhiprāyam, yenābhīṣṭa-devatā-smaraṇaṃ karoti |
GK22vispancu:6247: ca-mitra, tvaṃ mayā vadhāya samānīto bhāryā-vākyena viśvāsya |
GK22vispancu:6249: sa āha-bhrātaḥ ! kiṃ mayā tasyās tavāpi cāpakṛtaṃ yena me vadhopāyaś cintitaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6253: pratyutpanna-matir vānara āha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tat kiṃ tvayā mama
GK22vispancu:6254: tatraiva na vyāhṛtam ? yena sva-hṛdayaṃ jambū-koṭare sadaiva mayā suguptaṃ
GK22vispancu:6258: tad ākarṇya makaraḥ sānandam āha-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tad arpaya me hṛdayam
GK22vispancu:6259: | yena sā duṣṭa-patnī tad bhakṣayitvānaśanād utthiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:6260: ahaṃ tvāṃ tam eva jambū-pādapaṃ prāpayāmi |
GK22vispancu:6262: vānaro 'pi katham api jalpita-vividha-devatopacāra-pūjas tīram āsāditavān |
GK22vispancu:6263: tataś ca dīrghatara-caṅkramaṇena tam eva jambū-pādapam ārūḍhaś
GK22vispancu:6266: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste'pi na viśvaset |
GK22vispancu:6267: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati ||Panc_4.14||
GK22vispancu:6268: tan mamaitad adya punar janma-dinam iva sañjātam |
GK22vispancu:6269: iti cintayamānaṃ makara āha-bho mitra ! arpaya tad dhṛdayaṃ yathā te bhrātṛ-patnī bhakṣayitvānaśanād uttiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:6270: atha vihasya nirbhartsayan vānaras tam āha-dhig dhiṅ mūrkha viśvāsa-ghātaka ! kiṃ kasyacid dhṛdaya-dvayaṃ bhavati ? tad āśu gamyatāṃ
GK22vispancu:6273: sakṛd duṣṭaṃ ca yo mitraṃ punaḥ sandhātum icchati |
GK22vispancu:6274: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā ||Panc_4.15||
GK22vispancu:6275: tac chrutvā makaraḥ saṃvilakṣaṃ cintitavān-aho ! mayātimūḍhena kim asya
GK22vispancu:6277: tad yady asau punar api kathañcid viśvāsaṃ
GK22vispancu:6279: āha ca-mitra ! hāsyena mayā te'bhiprāyo labdhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6280: tasyā na kiñcit tava hṛdayena prayojanam |
GK22vispancu:6285: bubhukṣitaḥ kiṃ na karoti pāpaṃ kṣīṇā janā niṣkaruṇā bhavanti |
GK22vispancu:6292: kasmiṃścit kūpe gaṅgadatto nāma maṇḍūka-rājaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:6293: sa kadācid dāyādair udvejito 'raghaṭṭa-ghaṭīm āruhya niṣkrāntaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6294: atha tena cintitam-yat kathaṃ tesāṃ dāyādānāṃ mayā pratyapakāraḥ kartavyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6297: āpadi yenāpakṛtaṃ yena ca hasitaṃ daśāsu viṣamāsu |
GK22vispancu:6298: apakṛtya tayor ubhayoḥ punar api jātaṃ naraṃ manye ||Panc_4.17||
GK22vispancu:6299: evaṃ cintayan bile praviśantaṃ kṛṣṇasarpam apaśyat |
GK22vispancu:6301: acintayat-yad enaṃ tatra kūpe nītvā sakala-dāyādānām ucchedaṃ karomi |
GK22vispancu:6304: sva-kāryāya yato na syāt kācit pīḍātra tat-kṣaye ||Panc_4.18||
GK22vispancu:6306: śatrum unmūlayet prājñas tīkṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇena śatruṇā |
GK22vispancu:6308: evaṃ sa vibhāvya bila-dvāraṃ gatvā tam āhūtavān-ehy ehi priya-darśana !
GK22vispancu:6310: tac chrutvā sarpaś cintayāmāsa-ya evaṃ mām āhvayati |
GK22vispancu:6313: anyena kenāpi saha mama martya-loke sandhānaṃ nāsti |
GK22vispancu:6314: tad atraiva durge sthitas tāvad vedmi ko 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:6317: yasya na jāyate śīlaṃ na kulaṃ na ca saṃśrayaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6318: na tena saṅgatiṃ kuryād ity uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ ||Panc_4.20||
GK22vispancu:6319: kadācitko 'pi mantravādy auṣadha-caturo vā mām āhūya bandhane kṣipati |
GK22vispancu:6320: athavā kaścit puruṣo vairam āśritya kasyacid bhakṣaṇārthe mām āhvayati |
GK22vispancu:6322: sa āha-ahaṃ gaṅgadatto nāma maṇḍūkādhipatis tvat-sakāśe maitry-artham
GK22vispancu:6324: tac chrutvā sarpa āha-bho ! aśraddheyam etat yat-tṛṇānāṃ vahninā saha saṅgamaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6326: yo yasya jāyate vadhyaḥ sa svapne'pi kathañcana |
GK22vispancu:6327: na tat-samīpam abhyeti tat kim evaṃ prajalpasi ||Panc_4.21||
GK22vispancu:6333: sarva-nāśe ca sañjāte prāṇānām api saṃśaye |
GK22vispancu:6334: api śatruṃ praṇamyāpi rakṣet prāṇāndhanāni ca ||Panc_4.22||
GK22vispancu:6337: so 'py āha-kva te āśrayo vāpyāṃ kūpe taḍāge hrade vā |
GK22vispancu:6346: yac chakyaṃ grasituṃ yasya grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat |
GK22vispancu:6347: hitaṃ ca pariṇāme yat tad ādyaṃ bhūtim icchatā ||Panc_4.23||
GK22vispancu:6349: ahaṃ sukhopāyena tatra tava praveśaṃ kārayiṣyāmi |
GK22vispancu:6350: tathā tasya madhye jalopānte ramyataraṃ koṭaram asti |
GK22vispancu:6351: tatra sthitas tvaṃ līlayā dāyādān vyāpādayiṣyasi |
GK22vispancu:6352: tac chrutvā sarpo vyacintayat-ahaṃ tāvat pariṇata-vayāḥ |
GK22vispancu:6354: tat sukhāvaho jīvanopāyo 'yam anena kulāṅgāreṇa darśitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6355: tad gatvā tān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayāmi iti |
GK22vispancu:6358: sa hi sarva-sukhopāyāṃ vṛttim āracayed budhaḥ ||Panc_4.24||
GK22vispancu:6359: evaṃ vicintya tam āha-bho gaṅgadatta ! yady evaṃ tad-agre bhava |
GK22vispancu:6361: gaṅgadatta āha-bhoḥ priyadarśana ! ahaṃ tvāṃ sukhopāyena tatra neṣyāmi,
GK22vispancu:6362: sthānaṃ ca darśayiṣyāmi ta eva bhakṣaṇīyāḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:6363: sarpa āha-sāmprataṃ tvaṃ me mitraṃ jātam |
GK22vispancu:6366: evam uktvā bilān niṣkramya tam āliṅgya ca tenaiva saha prasthitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6367: atha kūpam āsādyāra-ghaṭṭa-ghaṭikā-mārgeṇa sarpas tenātmanā svālayaṃ nītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6371: sarpa āha-bho gaṅgadatta ! na samyag abhihitaṃ tvayā |
GK22vispancu:6372: katham ahaṃ tatra gacchāmi ? madīya-bila-durgam anyena ruddhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:6374: atra-sthasya me maṇḍūkam ekaikaṃ sva-vargīyaṃ prayaccha |
GK22vispancu:6375: no cet sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyāmi iti |
GK22vispancu:6376: tac chrutvā gaṅgadatto vyākula-manā vyācintayat-aho kim etan mayā kṛtaṃ sarpam ānayatā |
GK22vispancu:6377: tad yadi niṣedhayiṣyāmi tat sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:6380: sa karoti na sandehaḥ svayaṃ hi viṣa-bhakṣaṇam ||Panc_4.25||
GK22vispancu:6386: yo durbalo 'ṇūn api yācyamāno balīyasā yacchati naiva sāmnā |
GK22vispancu:6387: prayacchate naiva ca darśyamānaṃ khārīṃ sa cūrṇasya punar dadāti ||Panc_4.27||
GK22vispancu:6390: ardhena kurute kāryaṃ sarva-nāśo hi dustaraḥ ||Panc_4.28||
GK22vispancu:6391: na svalpasya kṛte bhūri nāśayen matimān naraḥ |
GK22vispancu:6392: etad eva hi pāṇḍityaṃ yat svalpād bhūri-rakṣaṇam ||Panc_4.29||
GK22vispancu:6397: yathā hi malinair vastrair yatra tatropaviśyate |
GK22vispancu:6398: evaṃ calita-vittas tu vitta-śeṣaṃ na rakṣati ||Panc_4.30||
GK22vispancu:6399: athānya-dine tenāparān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayitvā gaṅgadatta-suto yamunādatto bhakṣitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6400: taṃ bhakṣitaṃ matvā gaṅgadattas tāra-svareṇa dhig dhik pralāpa-paraḥ kathañcid api na virarāma
GK22vispancu:6403: sva-pakṣasya kṣaye jāte ko nas trātā bhaviṣyati ||Panc_4.31||
GK22vispancu:6404: tad adyāpi vicintyatām ātmano niṣkramaṇam asya vadhopāyaś ca |
GK22vispancu:6405: atha gacchatā kālena sakalam api kavalitaṃ maṇḍūka-kulam |
GK22vispancu:6410: tad dīyatāṃ me kiñcid bhojanaṃ yato 'haṃ tvayātrānītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6411: sa āha-bho mitra ! na tvayātra viṣaye mayāvasthitena kāpi cintā kāryā |
GK22vispancu:6412: tad yadi māṃ preṣayati tato 'nya-kūpa-sthān api maṇḍūkān viśvāsyātrānayāmi
GK22vispancu:6413: sa āha-mama tāvat tvam abhakṣyo bhrātṛ-sthāne |
GK22vispancu:6414: tad yady evaṃ karoṣi tat sāmprataṃ pitṛ-sthāne bhavasi |
GK22vispancu:6419: atha cirād anāgate gaṅgadatte priyadarśano 'nya-koṭara-nivāsinīṃ godhām
GK22vispancu:6422: tad gatvā tat-sakāśaṃ kutracij jalāśaye'nviṣya mama sandeśaṃ kathaya |
GK22vispancu:6423: yenāgamyatām ekākināpi bhavatā drutataraṃ yady anye maṇḍūkā nāgacchanti |
GK22vispancu:6424: ahaṃ tvayā vinā nātra vastuṃ śaknomi |
GK22vispancu:6425: tathā yady ahaṃ tava viruddham ācarāmi tat sukṛtam antare mayā vidhṛtam |
GK22vispancu:6426: godhāpi tad-vacanād gaṅgadattaṃ drutataram anviṣyāha-bhadra gaṅgadatta !
GK22vispancu:6427: sa tava suhṛt-priyadarśanas tava mārgaṃ samīkṣamāṇas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:6429: aparaṃ ca tena tava virūpa-karaṇe sukṛtam antare dhṛtam |
GK22vispancu:6433: bubhukṣitaḥ kiṃ na karoti pāpaṃ kṣīṇā narā niṣkaruṇā bhavanti |
GK22vispancu:6437: tad bho duṣṭa-jalacara ! aham api gaṅgadatta iva tvad-gṛhe na kathañcid api yāsyāmi |
GK22vispancu:6438: tac chrutvā makara āha-bho mitra ! athavātrāham anaśanāt prāṇa-tyāgaṃ
GK22vispancu:6440: vānara āha-mūḍha ! kim ahaṃ lambakarṇo mūrkhaḥ ? dṛṣṭvāpāyo 'pi svayam eva tatra gatvātmānaṃ vyāpādayāmi |
GK22vispancu:6441: āgataś ca gataś caiva gatvā yaḥ punar āgataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6444: kathaṃ dṛṣṭāpāyo 'pi mṛtaḥ ? tan me nivedyatām |
GK22vispancu:6448: kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe karāla-kesaro nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:6449: tasya ca dhūsarako nāma śṛgālaḥ sadaivānuyāyī paricārako 'sti |
GK22vispancu:6450: atha kadācit tasya hastinā saha yudhyamānasya śarīre gurutarāḥ prahārāḥ sañjātāḥ |
GK22vispancu:6451: yaiḥ padam ekam api calituṃ na śaknoti |
GK22vispancu:6454: anyasminn ahani tam avocat-svāmin ! bubhukṣaya pīḍito 'ham |
GK22vispancu:6455: padāt padam api calituṃ na śaknomi |
GK22vispancu:6457: siṃha āha-bhoḥ ! gaccha anveṣaya kiñcit sattvam |
GK22vispancu:6460: tad ākarṇya śṛgālo 'nveṣayan kañcit samīpa-vartinaṃ grāmam āsāditavān |
GK22vispancu:6461: tatra lambakarṇo nāma gardabhas taḍāgopānte pravirala-dūrvāṅkurān kṛcchrād āsvādayan dṛṣṭaḥ
GK22vispancu:6465: tat kathaya kim evaṃ durbalatāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:6471: śṛgāla āha-māma ! yady evaṃ tad asti marakata-sadṛśa-śaṣpa-prāyo
GK22vispancu:6475: lambakarṇa āha-bho bhaginī-suta ! yuktam uktaṃ bhavatā |
GK22vispancu:6480: tatrāsti na kaścid aparasya tatra praveśaḥ |
GK22vispancu:6483: tāś ca puṣṭim āpannā yauvanotkaṭā idaṃ mām ūcuḥ-yadi tvam asmākaṃ satyo mātulas tadā kaṃcid grāmāntaraṃ gatvāsmad-yogyaṃ kaścit patim ānaya |
GK22vispancu:6485: atha śṛgāla-vacanāni śrutvā kāma-pīḍitāṅgas tam avocat-bhadra ! yady evaṃ tad-agre bhava yenāgacchāmi |

GK22vispancu:7432: duradhigamaḥ para-bhāgo yāvat puruṣeṇa sāhasaṃ na kṛtam |

GK22vispancu:7444: tatra samprāptānāṃ yatra vartiḥ patiṣyati, tatra nidhānam asandigdhaṃ prāpyasva |
GK22vispancu:7445: tatra sthānaṃ khanitvā nidhiṃ gṛhītvā vyāghuṭyatām |
GK22vispancu:7446: tathānuṣṭhite teṣāṃ gacchatām ekatamasya hastād varitr nipapāta |
GK22vispancu:7447: athāsau yāvat taṃ praveśaṃ khanati tāvat tāmramayī bhūmiḥ |
GK22vispancu:7450: anye procuḥ-bho mūḍha ! kim anena kriyate yat prabhūtam api dāridryaṃ na nāśayati |
GK22vispancu:7454: evam abhidhāya tāmraṃ yathecchayā gṛhītvā prathamo nivṛttaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7457: so 'pi yāvat khanitum ārabdhas tāvad rūpya-mayī kṣitiḥ |
GK22vispancu:7458: tataḥ praharṣitaḥ prāha, yat-bho bho, gṛhyatāṃ yathecchayā rūpyam |
GK22vispancu:7463: kiṃ cānena prabhūtenāpi dāridrya-nāśo na bhavati |
GK22vispancu:7465: evam uktvā dvāv apy agre prasthitau |
GK22vispancu:7467: atha tayor api gacchator ekasyāgre vartiḥ papāta |
GK22vispancu:7469: prahṛṣṭo yāvat khanati, tāvat suvarṇa-bhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā dvitīyaṃ prāha-bho,
GK22vispancu:7471: suvarṇād anyan na kiñcid uttamaṃ bhaviṣyati
GK22vispancu:7473: prāk tāmraṃ, tato rūpyaṃ, tataḥ suvarṇam |
GK22vispancu:7474: tan nūnam ataḥ paraṃ ratnāni bhaviṣyanti |
GK22vispancu:7481: pipāsākulitaḥ siddhi-mārga-cyuta itaś cetaś ca babhrāma |
GK22vispancu:7482: atha bhrāmyan, sthalopari puruṣam ekaṃ rudhira-plāvita-gātraṃ
GK22vispancu:7485: ko bhavān ? kim evaṃ cakreṇa śirasi tiṣṭhasi ? tat kathaya me yadi kutracij jalam asti |
GK22vispancu:7486: evaṃ tasya pravadatas tac cakraṃ tat-kṣaṇāt tasya śiraso brāhmaṇa-mastake
GK22vispancu:7489: sa āha-mamāpy evam etac chirasi caṭitam ?
GK22vispancu:7490: sa āha-tat kathaya, kadaitad uttariṣyati ? mahatī me vedanā vartate |
GK22vispancu:7491: sa āha-yadā tvam iva kaścid adhṛta-siddha-vartir evam āgatya, tvām ālāpayiṣyati tadā tasya mastakaṃ caṭiṣyati |
GK22vispancu:7496: paraṃ yadā rāmo rājāsīt tavāhaṃ dāridryopahataḥ siddha-vartim ādāyānena pathā samāyātaḥ |
GK22vispancu:7497: tato mayānyo naro mastaka-śruta-cakro dṛṣṭaḥ, pṛṣṭaś ca |

GK22vispancu:7507: tasmiṃś cirayati sa suvarṇa-siddhis tasyānveṣaṇa-paras tat-pada-paṅktyā
GK22vispancu:7508: yāvat kiñcid vanāntaram āgacchati tāvad rudhira-plāvita-śarīras
GK22vispancu:7509: tīkṣṇa-cakreṇa mastake bhramatā sa-vedanaḥ kvaṇann upaviṣṭhas tiṣṭhatīti

GK22vispancu:7516: tac chrutvāsau taṃ vigarhayann idam āha-bhoḥ ! niṣiddhas tvaṃ mayānekaśo

GK22vispancu:7521: varaṃ buddhir na sā vidyā vidyāyā buddhir uttamā |

GK22vispancu:7531: mantritam-ko guṇo vidyāyāḥ, yena deśāntaraṃ gatvā, bhūpatīn paritoṣyārthopārjanaṃ na kriyate
GK22vispancu:7533: tathānuṣṭhite kiñcin mārgaṃ gatvā teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhataraḥ prāha-aho ! asmākam ekaś caturtho mūḍhaḥ
GK22vispancu:7539: tato dvitīyenābhihitam-bhoḥ subuddhe ! gaccha tvaṃ sva-gṛhaṃ, yatas te vidyā nāsti |

GK22vispancu:7545: kiṃ tayā kriyate lakṣmyā yā vadhūr iva kevalā |

GK22vispancu:8082: tat kiṃ karomi ? evaṃ cintayan so 'pi tena khalīnaṃ mukhe nidhāya kaśāghātena tāḍitaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8085: cauro 'pi dūraṃ gatvā khalīnākarṣaṇena taṃ sthiraṃ kartum ārabdhavān |
GK22vispancu:8087: atha taṃ tathāgaṇita-khalīnākarṣaṇaṃ matvā cauraś cintayāmāsa-aho naivaṃ-vidhā vājino bhavanty agaṇita-khalīnāḥ |
GK22vispancu:8090: bhūmi-deśam avalokayāmi tad ātmānaṃ tatra pātayāmi |
GK22vispancu:8092: evaṃ cintayata iṣṭa-devatāṃ smaratas tasya so 'śvo baṭa-vṛkṣasya tale niṣkrāntaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8094: tato dvāv api tau pṛthag-bhūtau paramānanda-bhājau jīvita-viṣaye labdha-pratyāśau
GK22vispancu:8096: atha tatra baṭe kaścid rākṣasa-suhṛd vānaraḥ sthita āsīt |
GK22vispancu:8097: tena rākṣasaṃ trastam ālokya vyāhṛtam-bho mitra ! kim eva alāyyate'līka-bhayena ? tad bhakṣyo 'yaṃ mānuṣaḥ bhakṣyatām |
GK22vispancu:8098: so 'pi vānara-vaco niśamya, svarūpam ādhāya śaṅkita-manāḥ skhalita-gatir
GK22vispancu:8100: cauro 'pi taṃ vānarāhūtaṃ jñātvā kopāt tasya lāṅgulaṃ
GK22vispancu:8102: vānaro 'pi taṃ rākṣasābhyadhikaṃ manyamāno bhayān na kiñcid uktavān |
GK22vispancu:8107: vikālena gṛhīto 'si yaḥ paraiti sa jīvati ||Panc_5.84||
GK22vispancu:8109: tat preṣaya māṃ yena gṛhaṃ gacchāmi |
GK22vispancu:8110: tvaṃ punar anubhuṅkṣvātra sthita eva lobha-vṛkṣa-phalam |
GK22vispancu:8114: durgas trikūṭaḥ parikhā samudro rakṣāṃsi yodhā dhanadāc ca vittam |
GK22vispancu:8115: śāstraṃ ca yasyośanasā praṇītaṃ sa rāvaṇo daiva-vaśād vipannaḥ ||Panc_5.85||
GK22vispancu:8118: trayo 'py anyāyataḥ siddhāḥ saṃmukhe karmaṇi sthite ||Panc_5.86||
GK22vispancu:8123: asty atra dharā-tala uttarā-pathe madhu-puraṃ nāma nagaram |
GK22vispancu:8125: tasya kadācid viṣaya-sukham anubhavatas tristanī kanyā babhūva |
GK22vispancu:8126: atha tāṃ trastanīṃ jātāṃ śrutvā sa rājā kañcukinaḥ provāca, yad-bhos tyajyatām iyaṃ trastanī gatvā dūre'raṇye
GK22vispancu:8128: tac chrutvā kañcukinaḥ procuḥ-mahārāja jñāyate yad aniṣṭa-kāriṇī tristanī kanyā bhavati |
GK22vispancu:8129: tathāpi brāhmaṇam āhūya praṣṭavyāḥ, yena loka-dvayaṃ na
GK22vispancu:8131: yaḥ satataṃ paripṛcchati śṛṇoti sandhārayaty aniśam |
GK22vispancu:8140: deva ! kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe caṇḍakarmā nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:8141: ekadā tena bhramatāṭavyāṃ kaścid brāhmaṇaḥ samāsāditaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8142: tatas tasya skandham āruhya provāca-bho agresaro gamyatām |
GK22vispancu:8144: atha tasya kamalodara-komalau pādau dṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇo rākṣasam apṛcchat-bhoḥ ! kim
GK22vispancu:8146: rākṣasa āha-bhoḥ ! vratam asti, nāham ārdra-pādo bhūmiṃ spṛśāmi |
GK22vispancu:8147: tatas tac chrutvātmano mokṣopāyaṃ cintayaṃs tat-saraḥ prāptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8149: rākṣasenābhihitaṃ-bhoḥ ! yāvad ahaṃ snānaṃ kṛtvā devatārcana-vidhiṃ
GK22vispancu:8150: vidhāyāgacchāmi tāvat tvayātaḥ sthānād anyatra na gantavyam |
GK22vispancu:8151: tathānuṣṭhite divjaś cintayāmāsa-nūnaṃ devatārcana-vidher ūrdhvaṃ mām eṣa
GK22vispancu:8153: tad drutataraṃ gacchāmi, yenaiṣa ārdra-pādo na mama pṛṣṭham eṣyati |
GK22vispancu:8154: tathānuṣṭhite rākṣaso vrata-bhaṅga-bhayāt tasya pṛṣṭhaṃ na gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:8157: atha tebhyas tac chrutvā-rājā dvijān āhūya provāca-bho brāhmaṇāḥ !
GK22vispancu:8158: tristanī me kanyā samutpannā, tat kiṃ tasyāḥ pratividhānam asti, na vā ?
GK22vispancu:8159: hīnāṅgī vādhikāṅgī vā yā bhavet kanyakā nṛṇām |
GK22vispancu:8160: bhartuḥ syāt sā vināśāya sva-śīla-nidhanāya ca ||Panc_5.89||
GK22vispancu:8161: yā punas tristanī kanyā yāti locana-gocaram |
GK22vispancu:8162: pitaraṃ nāśaty eva sā drutaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ||Panc_5.90||
GK22vispancu:8164: tathā yadi kaścid udvāhayati, tad enāṃ tasmai dattvā, deśa-tyāgena sa niyojayitavyaḥ iti |
GK22vispancu:8167: atha teṣāṃ tad-vacanam ākarṇya sa rājā paṭaha-śabdena sarvatra ghoṣaṇām ājñāpayāmāsa-aho ! tristanīṃ rājakanyāṃ yaḥ kaścid udvāhayati sa
GK22vispancu:8169: evaṃ tasyām āghoṣaṇāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ mahān kālo vyatītaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8171: sāpi yauvanonmukhī sañjātā sugupta-sthāna-sthitā yatnena rakṣyamāṇā tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:8172: atra tatraiva nagare kaścid andhas tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:8177: yadi katham api daivāt kanyā labhyate |
GK22vispancu:8178: suvarṇa-prāptiś ca bhavati, tathā sukhena suvarṇa-prāptyā kālo vrajati |
GK22vispancu:8179: atha yadi tasya doṣato mṛtyur bhavati |
GK22vispancu:8186: evam uktvāndhena gatvā, sa paṭahaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8187: uktaṃ ca-bhoḥ ! ahaṃ tāṃ kanyām udvāhayāmi, yadi rājā me prayacchati |
GK22vispancu:8188: tatas tai rāja-puruṣair gatvā rājñe niveditam-deva ! andhena kenacit paṭahaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8191: andho vā vadhiro vātha kuṣṭī vāpy antyajo 'pi vā |
GK22vispancu:8192: parigṛhṇātu tāṃ kanyāṃ sa-lakṣāṃ syād videśagaḥ ||Panc_5.92||
GK22vispancu:8193: atha rājādeśāt tai rāja-puruṣais taṃ nadī-tīre nītvā suvarṇa-lakṣeṇa samaṃ
GK22vispancu:8194: vivāha-vidhinā tristanīṃ tasmai dattvā, jala-yāne nidhāya kaivartāḥ proktāḥ-bho ! deśāntaraṃ nītvā kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne'ndhaḥ sapatnīkaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8196: tathānuṣṭhite videśam āsādya kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kaivarta-darśite trayo
GK22vispancu:8197: 'pi mūlyena gṛhaṃ prāptāḥ sukhena kālaṃ nayanti sma |
GK22vispancu:8198: kevalam andhaḥ paryaṅke suptas tiṣṭhati, gṛha-vyāpāraṃ mantharakaḥ karoti |
GK22vispancu:8199: evaṃ gacchatā kālena tristanyā kubjakena saha vikṛtiḥ samapadyata |
GK22vispancu:8202: yadi syāc chrī-talo vahniś candramā dahanātmakaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8203: susvādaḥ sāgaraḥ strīṇāṃ tat-satīs tvaṃ prajāyate ||Panc_5.93||
GK22vispancu:8204: athānyedyus tristanyā mantharako 'bhihitaḥ-bhoḥ subhaga ! yady eṣo 'ndhaḥ
GK22vispancu:8205: kathañcit vyāpādyate, tad āvayoḥ sukhena kālo yāti |
GK22vispancu:8206: tad anviṣyatāṃ kutracid viṣam, yenāsmai tat pradāya sukhinī bhavāmi |
GK22vispancu:8207: anyadā kubjakena paribhramatā mṛtaḥ kṛṣṇasarpaḥ prāptaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8208: taṃ gṛhītvā prahṛṣṭa-manā gṛham abhyetya tām āha-subhage ! labdho 'yaṃ kṛṣṇa-sarpaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8209: tad enaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā prabhūta-śuṇṭhy-ādibhiḥ saṃskāryāsmai
GK22vispancu:8210: vikala-netrāya matsyāmiṣaṃ bhaṇitvā prayaccha yena drāg vinaśyati |
GK22vispancu:8214: sāpi pradīpte vahnau kṛṣṇa-sarpaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā takra-sthālyām ādhāya
GK22vispancu:8218: te ca matsyā vahnau pāvanāya tiṣṭhanti |
GK22vispancu:8220: tāvat tvaṃ darvīm ādāya kṣaṇam ekaṃ tān pracālaya |
GK22vispancu:8221: so 'pi tad ākarṇya hṛṣṭa-manāḥ sṛkkaṇī parilihan drutam utthāya darvīm ādāya pramathitum ārabdhaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8224: asāv apy andhas taṃ bahu-guṇaṃ manyamāno viśeṣān netrābhyāṃ bāṣpa-grahaṇam akarot |
GK22vispancu:8225: tato labdha-dṛṣṭir jāto yāvat paśyati, tāvat takra-madhye
GK22vispancu:8227: tato vyacintayat-aho, kim etat ? mama matsyāmiṣaṃ kathitam āsīd anayā |
GK22vispancu:8229: tat tāvad vijānāmi samyak tristanyāś ceṣṭitam |
GK22vispancu:8230: kiṃ mama vadhopāya-kramaḥ kubjasya vā ? utāho anyasya vā kasyacit ? evaṃ vicintya svākāraṃ gūhayann andhavat karma karoti yathā purā |
GK22vispancu:8231: atrāntare kubjaḥ samāgatya niḥśaṅkatayāliṅgana-cumbanādibhis tristanīṃ sevitum upacakrame
GK22vispancu:8232: so 'py andhas tam avalokayann api yāvan na kiñcic chastraṃ paśyati, tāvat kopa-vyākula-manāḥ pūrvavac chayanaṃ gatvā kubjaṃ caraṇābhyāṃ saṅgṛhya sāmarthyāt sva-mastakopari bhrāmayitvā tristanīṃ hṛdaye vyatāḍayat |
GK22vispancu:8233: atha kubja-prahāreṇa tasyās tṛtīyaḥ stana urasi praviṣṭaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8234: tathā balān mastakopari bhramaṇena kubjaḥ prāñjalatāṃ gataḥ |
GK22vispancu:8240: atha evam eva yo vartate, sa tvam iva vinaśyati |
GK22vispancu:8248: kasmiṃścit sarovare bhāruṇḍa-nāmā pakṣī ekodaraḥ pṛthag-grīvaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:8249: tena ca samudra-tīre paribhramatā kañcit phalam amṛta-kalpaṃ
GK22vispancu:8254: tat kiṃ pārijāta-haricandana-taru-sambhavam ? kiṃ vā, kiñcid
GK22vispancu:8256: evaṃ tasya bruvato dvitīya-mukhenābhihitam-bho, yady evaṃ tan mamāpi stokaṃ prayaccha, yenāham api jihvā-saukhyam anubhavāmi |
GK22vispancu:8257: tato vihasya prathama-vaktreṇābhihitam-āvayos tāvad ekam udaram |
GK22vispancu:8259: tataḥ kiṃ pṛthag bhakṣitena ? varam anena śeṣeṇa priyā toṣyate |
GK22vispancu:8260: evam abhidhāya tena śeṣaṃ bhāruṇḍyāḥ pradattam |
GK22vispancu:8263: dvitīyaṃ mukhaṃ tad-dinād eva prabhṛti sodvegaṃ sa-viṣādaṃ ca tiṣṭhati |
GK22vispancu:8266: nistriṃśa ! puruṣādhama ! nirapekṣa ! mayā viṣa-phalam āsāditam |
GK22vispancu:8269: evaṃ kṛte dvayor api vināśo bhaviṣyati |
GK22vispancu:8270: athaivaṃ vadatā tenāpamānena tat phalaṃ bhakṣitam |
GK22vispancu:8278: ekaḥ svādu na bhuñjīta ekaś cārthān na cintayet |
GK22vispancu:8279: eko na gacched adhvānaṃ naikaḥ supteṣu jāgṛyāt ||Panc_5.95||
GK22vispancu:8287: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne brahmadatta-nāmā brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma |
GK22vispancu:8288: sa ca prayojana-vaśād grāmaṃ prasthitaḥ sva-mātrābhihitaḥ, yad-vatsa ! katham ekākī vrajasi ? tad anviṣyatāṃ kaścid dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8292: atha tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā samīpastha-vāpyāḥ sakāśāt karkaṭam ādāya
GK22vispancu:8296: so 'pi mātur vacanād ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ na saṅgṛhya karpūra-puṭikā-madhye
GK22vispancu:8298: atha gacchan grīṣmoṣmaṇā santaptaḥ kañcin mārgasthaṃ vṛkṣam āsādya,
GK22vispancu:8304: karkaṭas tatraiva sthitaḥ san sarpa-prāṇān apāharata |
GK22vispancu:8305: brāhmaṇe'pi yāvat prabuddhaḥ paśyati, tāvat samīpe mṛta-kṛṣṇa-sarpo nija-pārśve
GK22vispancu:8309: prasanno bhūtvābravīc ca-bhoḥ ! satyam abhihitaṃ mama mātrā yat puruṣeṇa ko 'pi sahāyaḥ kāryaḥ
GK22vispancu:8311: yato mayā śraddhā-pūrita-cetasā tad-vacanam anuṣṭhitaṃ tenāhaṃ karkaṭena
GK22vispancu:8314: kṣīṇaḥ śrayati śaśī ravim ṛddho vardhayati payasāṃ nātham |
GK22vispancu:8315: anye vipadi sahāyā dhanināṃ śriyam anubhavanty anye ||Panc_5.97||
GK22vispancu:8316: mantre tīrthe dvije deve daivajñe bheṣaje gurau |
GK22vispancu:8317: yādṛśī bhāvanā yasya siddhir bhavati tādṛśī ||Panc_5.98||
GK22vispancu:8318: evam śrutvā suvarṇasiddhis tam anujñāpya svagṛhaṃ prati nivṛttaḥ |
GK22vispancu:8319: iti śrī-viṣṇu-śarma-viracite pañcatantre aparīkṣita-kārakaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ tantraṃ samāptam
GK22vispancu:8320: . yady apy evaṃ tathāpi tvaṃ darśaya taṃ caurasiṃhaṃ yathā vyāpādayāmi |
